name: prawn
example: 单词 prawn 的例句||||I'm not very keen on fish, but prawn. 我不是特别爱吃鱼，但爱吃对虾。||||Yesterday we ate prawn dish for lunch. 昨天午餐我们吃了一盘对虾。

name: lizard
example: 单词 lizard 的例句||||A chameleon is a kind of lizard. 变色龙是一种蜥蜴。||||The lizard darted out its tongue at the insect. 蜥蜴伸出舌头去吃小昆虫。

name: hoop
example: 单词 hoop 的例句||||The child was rolling a hoop. 那个孩子在滚铁环。|||| The wooden tub is fitted with the iron hoop. 木盆都用铁箍箍紧。

name: moth
example: 单词 moth 的例句||||A moth was fluttering round the lamp. 有一只蛾子扑打着翅膀绕着灯飞。||||The sweater is moth-eaten. 毛衣让蛀虫咬坏了。

name: sitting-room
example: 单词 sitting-room 的例句||||The sitting-room is clean. 起居室很清洁。||||Each villa has a separate sitting-room. 每栋别墅都有一间独立的起居室。

name: charcoal
example: 单词 charcoal 的例句||||We need to get some more charcoal for the barbecue. 我们烧烤需要更多的碳。||||Charcoal is used to filter water. 木炭是用来过滤水的。

name: choir
interpret: n.唱诗班，唱诗班的席位，合唱团，舞蹈团；v.合唱
example: 单词 choir 的例句||||The choir sang the words out with great vigor. 合唱团以极大的热情唱出了歌词。||||The church choir is singing tonight. 今晚教堂歌唱队要唱诗。

name: folder
example: 单词 folder 的例句||||Peter returned the plan and charts to their folder. 彼得把这份计划和表格放回文件夹中。||||He draws the document from its folder. 他把文件从硬纸夹里抽出来。

name: stapler
example: 单词 stapler 的例句||||The stapler belongs to her. 这订书机是她的。||||Can you hand me that stapler? 请你把订书机拿给我，好吗？

name: ostrich
example: 单词 ostrich 的例句||||Ostrich is the fastest animal on two legs. 驼鸟是双腿跑得最快的动物。||||The ostrich indeed inhabits continents. 鸵鸟确实是生活在大陆上的。

name: octopus
example: 单词 octopus 的例句||||He experienced nausea after eating octopus. 吃了章鱼后他感到恶心。||||One octopus has eight tentacles. 一条章鱼有八根触角。

name: ketchup
example: 单词 ketchup 的例句||||There's a spot of ketchup on the tablecloth. 桌布上有一点番茄酱的渍斑。||||Could I have some ketchup and napkins, please? 请给我一些番茄酱和纸手巾？

name: carnation
example: 单词 carnation 的例句||||He had a white carnation in his buttonhole. 他在纽扣孔上佩了朵白色康乃馨。||||He was wearing a carnation in his lapel. 他的翻领里别着一枝康乃馨。

name: fertilize
example: 单词 fertilize 的例句||||Fertilizer is a substance put on land to fertilize it. 肥料是施在地里使之肥沃的物质。|||| Reading will fertilize his vocabulary. 阅读会丰富他的词汇。

name: orchid
example: 单词 orchid 的例句||||The orchid is a class of plant which I have never tried to grow. 兰花这类植物我从来没种过。||||There are over 35 000 species of orchid distributed throughout the world. 有35,000多种兰花分布在世界各地。

name: willow
example: 单词 willow 的例句||||The river was sparsely lined with willow trees. 河边疏疏落落有几棵柳树。||||The willow's shadow falls on the lake. 垂柳的影子倒映在湖面上。

name: leopard
example: 单词 leopard 的例句||||I saw a man in a leopard skin yesterday. 我昨天看见一个穿着豹皮的男人。||||The leopard's skin is marked with black spots. 豹皮上有黑色斑点。

name: photocopier
example: 单词 photocopier 的例句||||You've left your master in the photocopier. 你把原件留在影印机里了。||||If the photocopier stops working, just give it a clout. 如果那部影印机停止运转的话就敲它一下。

name: Oxford
example: 单词 Oxford 的例句||||At present he has become a Professor of Chemistry at Oxford. 他现在已是牛津大学的化学教授了。||||This is where the road to Oxford joins the road to London. 这是去牛津的路与去伦敦的路的汇合处。

name: puncture
example: 单词 puncture 的例句||||Failure did not puncture my confidence. 失败并没有挫伤我的信心。||||My bicycle had a puncture and needed patching up. 我的自行车胎扎了个洞，需要修补。

name: cork
example: 单词 cork 的例句||||We heard the pop of a cork. 我们听见瓶塞砰的一声打开。||||Cork is a very buoyant material. 软木是极易浮起的材料。

name: harry
example: 单词 harry 的例句||||Today, people feel more hurried and harried. 今天，人们感到更加忙碌和苦恼。||||Obama harried business by Healthcare Reform plan. 奥巴马用医改掠夺了商界。

name: maker
example: 单词 maker 的例句||||He is a trouble maker. You must be distant with him. 他是个捣蛋鬼，你不要跟他在一起。||||A cabinet maker must be a master craftsman. 家具木工必须是技艺高超的手艺人。

name: neatly
interpret: adv.整洁地，干净地，灵巧地，熟练地
example: 单词 neatly 的例句||||Sailors know how to wind up a long rope neatly. 水手们知道怎样把一条大绳利落地缠好。||||The child's dress is neatly gathered at the neck. 那孩子的衣服在领口处打着整齐的皱褶。

name: prehistoric
interpret: adj.（有记载的）历史以前的，史前的，古老的
example: 单词 prehistoric 的例句||||They have found prehistoric remains. 他们发现了史前遗迹。||||It was rather like an exhibition of prehistoric electronic equipment. 这儿倒像是在展览古老的电子设备。

name: oasis
interpret: n.（沙漠中的）绿洲，宜人的地方
example: 单词 oasis 的例句||||They stopped for the night at an oasis. 他们在沙漠中的绿洲停下来过夜。||||The town was an oasis of prosperity in a desert of poverty. 该镇是贫穷荒漠中的一块繁荣的“绿洲”。

name: A.D.(Anno Domini)
example: 单词 A.D.(Anno Domini) 的例句||||He lived in the sixth century A.D.他生活在公元六世纪。||||A.D.first-fourth centuries greece is part of the roman empire. 公元1-4世纪希腊成为罗马帝国的一部分。

name: mirage
example: 单词 mirage 的例句||||Perhaps we are all just chasing a mirage. 也许我们都只是在追逐一个幻想。||||Western liberalism was always a mirage. 西方自由主义永远是一座海市蜃楼。

name: acrobat
example: 单词 acrobat 的例句||||The acrobat balanced a long pole on his left shoulder. 杂技演员让一根长杆在他的左肩上保持平衡。|||| The acrobat could bend himself into a hoop. 这个杂技演员可以把身体蜷曲成圆形。

name: penicillin
example: 单词 penicillin 的例句||||I should have asked him for a shot of penicillin. 我应当让他给我打一针青霉素的。||||Penicillin was an extremely significant medical discovery. 青霉素是极其重要的医学发现。

name: snail
example: 单词 snail 的例句||||Snail is a small plant-eating creature with a soft body. 蜗牛是一种软体草食动物。||||Time moved at a snail's pace before the holidays. 放假前的时间过得很慢。

name: bowler
interpret: n.打保龄球的人，（板球的）投（球）手
example: 单词 bowler 的例句||||The bowler judged it well, timing the ball to perfection. 投球手判断准确，对球速的掌握恰到好处。|||| The captain decided to take Snow off and try a slower bowler. 队长决定把斯诺撤下，换一个动作慢一点的投球手试一试。

name: radiator
example: 单词 radiator 的例句||||The two ends of the pipeline are connected with the radiator. 管道的两端与暖气片相连接。||||Top up the radiator before making a long journey. 在长途旅行前加满散热器。

name: detergent
example: 单词 detergent 的例句||||He recommended a new detergent to me. 他向我推荐一种新的洗涤剂。||||This detergent can remove stubborn stains. 这种去污剂能去除难洗的污渍。

name: antibiotic
example: 单词 antibiotic 的例句||||The doctor said that I should take some antibiotic. 医生说我应该服些用抗生素。||||Antibiotic can be used against infection. 抗菌素可以用来防止感染。

name: crater
example: 单词 crater 的例句||||With a telescope you can see the huge crater of Ve-suvius. 用望远镜你能看到巨大的维苏威火山口。|||| They came to the lip of a dead crater. 他们来到了一个死火山口。

name: coffin
example: 单词 coffin 的例句||||When one's coffin is covered, all discussion about him can be settled. 盖棺论定。||||The coffin was placed in the grave. 那口棺材已安放到坟墓里去了。

name: bouquet
example: 单词 bouquet 的例句||||This wine has a rich bouquet. 这种葡萄酒有浓郁的香气。||||Her wedding bouquet consisted of roses and ivy. 她的婚礼花篮包括玫瑰和长春藤。

name: observatory
interpret: n.天文台，气象台，瞭望台，观测台
example: 单词 observatory 的例句||||Guy's house was close to the observatory. 盖伊的房子离天文台很近。||||Officials from Greenwich Observatory have the clock checked twice a day. 格林威治天文台的职员们每天对大钟检查两次。

name: mathematician
example: 单词 mathematician 的例句||||The man with his back to the camera is a mathematician. 背对着照相机的人是位数学家。||||The mathematician analyzed his figures again. 这位数学家再次分析研究了他的这些数字。

name: encyclopaedia
example: 单词 encyclopaedia 的例句||||An encyclopaedia contains a lot of knowledge. 百科全书包含很多知识。||||This is an encyclopaedia of philosophy. 这是本哲学百科全书。

name: housekeeper
interpret: n.管理家务的主妇，女管家
example: 单词 housekeeper 的例句||||A spotless stove told us that his mother is a diligent housekeeper. 炉子清洁无瑕就表明他母亲是个勤劳的主妇。||||She is an economical housekeeper and feeds her family cheaply. 她节约持家，一家人吃得很省。

name: subtitle
interpret: n.副题（书本中的），说明对白的字幕
example: 单词 subtitle 的例句||||His new book has a subtitle. 他的新书有一个副标题。||||Ah! I don't know why they don't subtitle these movies. 唉！我不知道这些电影为什么不打字幕。

name: syllable
example: 单词 syllable 的例句||||You put too much emphasis on the last syllable. 你把最后一个音节读得太重。||||The stress on the last syllable is light. 最后一个音节是轻音节。

name: applied
example: 单词 applied 的例句||||She plans to take a course in applied linguistics. 她打算学习应用语言学课程。||||This cream is best applied to the face at night. 这种乳霜最好晚上擦脸用。

name: Buddhism
example: 单词 Buddhism 的例句||||Buddhism was introduced into China about 67 AD. 佛教是在公元67年左右传入中国的。||||Many people willingly converted to Buddhism. 很多人情愿皈依佛教。

name: landmark
interpret: n.陆标，划时代的事，地界标
example: 单词 landmark 的例句||||The Russian Revolution represents a landmark in world history. 俄国革命是世界历史上的一个里程碑。|||| The tower was once a landmark for ships. 这座塔曾是船只的陆标。

name: recording
example: 单词 recording 的例句||||How long will the recording of the song take? 录下这首歌得花多少时间？||||I want to play you a recording of the rehearsal. 我想给你放一下彩排的录像。

name: scenic
interpret: adj.自然景色的，景色优美的
example: 单词 scenic 的例句||||The scenic beauty of the place entranced the visitors. 这里的美丽风光把游客们迷住了。||||The scenic spot is on northwestern outskirts of Beijing. 这个风景区位于北京的西北远郊。

name: sunbathe
example: 单词 sunbathe 的例句||||She liked to sunbathe in the seclusion of her own garden. 她喜欢在自己僻静的花园里晒日光浴。||||People sunbathe in the nude on the rocks above the creek. 人们在露出小溪的岩石上裸体晒日光浴。

name: varied
example: 单词 varied 的例句||||The forms of art are many and varied. 艺术的形式是多种多样的。||||The hotel has a varied programme of nightly entertainment. 宾馆有各种晚间娱乐活动。

name: accurately
example: 单词 accurately 的例句||||It is hard to hit the ball accurately. 准确地击中球很难。||||Now scientists can forecast the weather accurately. 现在科学家们能准确地预报天气。

name: bad-tempered
example: 单词 bad-tempered 的例句||||He grew more and more bad-tempered as the afternoon wore on. 随着下午一点点地过去，他的脾气也越来越坏。||||I know he's often bad-tempered but really, you know, he's got a heart of gold. 我知道他经常发脾气，但是，要知道，其实他心肠很好。

name: detailed
interpret: adj.详细的，详尽的，极注意细节的，完全的
example: 单词 detailed 的例句||||He had made a detailed study of the terrain. 他对地形作了缜密的研究。||||A detailed list of our publications is available on request. 我们的出版物有一份详细的目录备索。

name: crossword
interpret: n.纵横字谜，纵横填字游戏
example: 单词 crossword 的例句||||He shows a great interest in crossword puzzles. 他对填字游戏表现出很大兴趣。||||Don't chuck yesterday's paper out. I still haven't done the crossword. 别扔了昨天的报纸，我还没做字谜游戏呢。

name: fictional
example: 单词 fictional 的例句||||The names of the shops are entirely fictional. 那些商店的名字完全是虚构的。||||The two authors represent the opposite poles of fictional genius. 这两位作者代表了天才小说家两个极端。

name: sculptor
example: 单词 sculptor 的例句||||A sculptor forms her material. 雕塑家把材料塑造成雕塑品。||||The sculptor rounded the clay into a sphere. 那位雕塑家把黏土做成了一个球状。

name: sergeant
example: 单词 sergeant 的例句||||His elder brother is a sergeant. 他哥哥是个警官。||||How many stripes are there on the sleeve of a sergeant? 陆军中士的袖子上有多少条纹？

name: villa
example: 单词 villa 的例句||||We rented a villa in France for the summer holidays. 我们在法国租了一幢别墅消夏。||||We are quartered in a beautiful villa. 我们住在一栋漂亮的别墅里。

name: wary
example: 单词 wary 的例句||||He is wary of telling secrets to others. 他谨防向他人泄露秘密。||||Paula frowned, suddenly wary. 宝拉皱了皱眉头，突然警惕起来。

name: middle-aged
example: 单词 middle-aged 的例句||||I noticed two middle-aged passengers. 我注意到两个中年乘客。||||The new skin balm was welcome by middle-aged women. 这种新护肤香膏受到了中年妇女的欢迎。

name: hymn
example: 单词 hymn 的例句||||They sang a hymn of praise to God. 他们唱着圣歌，赞美上帝。||||The choir has sung only two verses of the last hymn. 合唱团只唱了最后一首赞美诗的两个段落。

name: enrol
interpret: vt. 登记；卷起；入学；使入会 vi. 注册；参军
example: 单词 enrol 的例句||||I like your institute but I do not want to enrol. 我喜欢你们学院但我不想报名去你院。||||They decided to enrol him as a member of the society. 他们决定吸收他成为会社的成员。

name: farmhouse
interpret: n.农场住宅（尤指主要住房）
example: 单词 farmhouse 的例句||||We fell for the farmhouse as soon as we saw it. 我们对那所农舍一见倾心。||||We put up for the night at a farmhouse. 我们在一间农舍投宿了一夜。

name: shuffle
interpret: n.拖著脚走，洗纸牌；v.拖曳，慢吞吞地走
example: 单词 shuffle 的例句||||I wish you'd remember to shuffle before you deal. 我希望在你发牌前记得洗牌。||||Don't shuffle your feet along. 别拖着脚步走。

name: bland
interpret: adj.淡而无味的，温和的，无刺激性的
example: 单词 bland 的例句||||He eats bland food because of his stomach trouble. 他因胃病而吃清淡的食物。||||This soup is too bland for me. 这汤我喝起来偏淡。

name: grill
interpret: n.烤架，铁格子，烤肉；v.烧，烤，严加盘问
example: 单词 grill 的例句||||Put it under the grill for a minute to brown the top. 放在烤架下烤一分钟把上面烤成金黄色。||||I'll grill you some mutton. 我来给你烤一些羊肉吃。

name: stew
interpret: n.炖汤，焖，烦恼；v.炖汤，焖，忧虑
example: 单词 stew 的例句||||The stew must be boiled up before serving. 炖肉必须煮熟才能上桌。||||There's no need to get in a stew. 没有必要烦恼。

name: gorilla
example: 单词 gorilla 的例句||||I was awed by the huge gorilla. 那只大猩猩使我惊惧。||||A gorilla is just a speechless animal. 猩猩只不过是一种不会说话的动物。

name: zipper
example: 单词 zipper 的例句||||The zipper is red. 这条拉链是红色的。||||The zipper is a wonderful invention. 拉链是个了不起的发明。

name: awesome
interpret: adj.令人惊叹的，难得吓人的，很好的
example: 单词 awesome 的例句||||The church in Ireland has always exercised an awesome power. 爱尔兰的教堂一直掌握着令人敬畏的权力。||||That new white convertible is totally awesome. 那辆新的白色折篷汽车简直棒极了.

name: teaspoon
example: 单词 teaspoon 的例句||||Add one teaspoon of sugar. 加一小茶匙糖。||||I need a teaspoon to stir my tea. 我需要一把茶匙搅一搅茶。

name: miller
example: 单词 miller 的例句||||Every miller draws water to his own mill. 磨坊主都往自己磨里注水。||||The skilful miller killed millions of lions with his ski. 技术娴熟的磨坊主用雪橇杀死了上百万头狮子。

name: ken
example: 单词 ken 的例句||||Such things are beyond my ken. 我可不懂这些事。|||| Abstract words are beyond the ken of children. 抽象的言辞超出小孩所理解的范围。

name: dice
interpret: n.骰子；vt.把（食物）切成小方块，冒险
example: 单词 dice 的例句||||They were playing dice. 他们在玩掷骰子游戏。||||A dice is a cube. 骰子是立方体。

name: thump
interpret: vt. 重击；用拳头打；砰地撞到 vi. 重击；狠打；砰然地响 n. 重打；重击声
example: 单词 thump 的例句||||The thief hit him a thump on the head. 贼在他的头上重击一下。||||The excitement made her heart thump. 她兴奋得心怦怦地跳。

name: cone
interpret: n.圆锥体，圆锥形东西，球果
example: 单词 cone 的例句||||Saw-dust piled up in a great cone. 锯屑堆积如山。||||The police have sectioned off part of the road with traffic cone. 警察用锥形路标把部分路面分隔开来。

name: toad
example: 单词 toad 的例句||||Both the toad and frog are amphibian. 蟾蜍和青蛙都是两栖动物。||||Many kinds of toad hibernate in winter. 许多种蟾蜍在冬天都会冬眠。

name: calf
example: 单词 calf 的例句||||The cow slinked its calf. 那头母牛早产了一头小牛犊。||||The calf blared for its mother. 牛犊哞哞地高声叫喊找妈妈。

name: Pluto
example: 单词 Pluto 的例句||||Pluto was thought to be the furthest planet from the sun. 冥王星曾被认为是离太阳最远的行星。||||Pluto has an elliptic orbit. 冥王星的轨道是椭圆形的。

name: retired
example: 单词 retired 的例句||||The old man retired to the country for rest. 这位老人下乡休息去了。||||Many retired people take up gardening as a hobby. 许多退休的人都以从事园艺为嗜好。

name: pickle
example: 单词 pickle 的例句||||Mother used to pickle onions. 妈妈过去常腌制洋葱。||||Meat can be preserved in pickle. 肉可以保存在卤水里。

name: accordion
example: 单词 accordion 的例句||||The accordion music in the film isn't very beautiful. 这部影片中的手风琴音乐不是很好。||||The accordion music reminds me of my boyhood. 这手风琴的乐声让我回忆起了我的少年时代。

name: grasshopper
example: 单词 grasshopper 的例句||||He thought he had made an end of the little grasshopper. 他以为把那个小蚱蜢干掉了。||||The grasshopper could not find anything to eat. 蚱蜢找不到任何吃的东西。

name: carving
example: 单词 carving 的例句||||All the furniture in the room had much carving. 房间里所有的家具上都有许多雕刻。||||He acquired the craft of wood carving in his native town. 他在老家学会了木雕手艺。

name: eyelid
example: 单词 eyelid 的例句||||She lifted one eyelid to see what he was doing. 她抬起一只眼皮看看他在做什么。||||My eyelid has been tumid since yesterday. 从昨天起，我的眼皮就肿了。

name: beak
example: 单词 beak 的例句||||The bird had a worm in its beak. 鸟儿嘴里叼着一条虫。||||This bird employs its beak as a weapon. 这种鸟用嘴作武器。

name: recess
interpret: n.短期休息，壁凹（墙上装架子，柜子等凹处）
example: 单词 recess 的例句||||The chairman of the meeting announced a ten-minute recess. 会议主席宣布休会10分钟。|||| Parliament was hastily recalled from recess. 休会的议员被匆匆召回开会。

name: buddy
example: 单词 buddy 的例句||||Calm down, buddy. What's the trouble? 压压气，老兄。有什么麻烦吗？||||Get out of my way, buddy! 别挡道了，你这家伙！

name: uncommon
interpret: adj.罕见的，非凡的，不平常的
example: 单词 uncommon 的例句||||Such attitudes were not at all uncommon thirty years ago. 这些看法在30年前很常见。||||Phil has uncommon intelligence. 菲尔智力超群。

name: delightful
interpret: adj.令人高兴的，使人快乐的
example: 单词 delightful 的例句||||We had a delightful time by the seashore last Sunday. 上星期天我们在海滨玩得真痛快。||||Peter played a delightful melody on his flute. 彼得用笛子吹奏了一支欢快的曲子。

name: itch
example: 单词 itch 的例句||||Shylock has an itch for money. 夏洛克渴望发财。|||| He had an itch on his back. 他背部发痒。

name: icon
example: 单词 icon 的例句||||They found an icon in the monastery. 他们在修道院中发现了一个圣像。||||Click on this icon to align or justify text. 点击这个图标使文本排齐。

name: contraction
example: 单词 contraction 的例句||||The contraction of this muscle raises the lower arm. 肌肉的收缩使前臂抬起。||||The forces of expansion are balanced by forces of contraction. 扩张力和收缩力相互平衡。

name: contented
example: 单词 contented 的例句||||He won't be contented until he's upset everyone in the office. 不把办公室里的每个人弄得心烦意乱他就不会满足。||||The people are making a good living and are contented, each in his station. 人民安居乐业。

name: daydream
example: 单词 daydream 的例句||||Boys and girls daydream about what they want to be. 孩子们遐想着他们将来要干什么。||||He drifted off into another daydream. 他飘飘然又做了一个白日梦。

name: fingerprint
example: 单词 fingerprint 的例句||||The fingerprint expert was asked to testify at the trial. 指纹专家应邀出庭作证。||||The court heard evidence from a fingerprint expert. 法院听取了指纹专家的证词。

name: humanitarian
interpret: n.人道主义者，博爱者，基督凡人论者
example: 单词 humanitarian 的例句||||She has many humanitarian interests and contributes a lot to them. 她拥有很多慈善事业，并作了很大的贡献。||||The British government has now suspended humanitarian aid to the area. 英国政府现已暂停对这一地区的人道主义援助。

name: kidnapper
example: 单词 kidnapper 的例句||||The kidnapper was shot dead then and there by the armed policeman. 绑架者被武装警察当时当地击毙。|||| The kidnapper strangled the child with a piece of string. 绑票的人用一根绳子把这孩子勒死了。

name: nomination
example: 单词 nomination 的例句||||John is favourite to get the nomination for club president. 约翰最有希望被提名为俱乐部主席。||||Few people pronounced for his nomination. 很少人表示赞成他的提名。

name: excellence
example: 单词 excellence 的例句||||His art has reached a high degree of excellence. 他的艺术已达到炉火纯青的地步。||||My performance is far below excellence. 我的表演离优秀还差得远呢。

name: casually
interpret: adv.漠不关心地，无动于衷地，不负责任地
example: 单词 casually 的例句||||She remarked casually that she was changing her job. 她当时漫不经心地说要换工作。||||I casually mentioned that I might be interested in working abroad. 我不经意地提到我可能会对出国工作感兴趣。

name: checkout
example: 单词 checkout 的例句||||Could you pay at the checkout. 你能在结帐处付款吗。||||A man was wheeling his shopping trolley to the checkout. 一个男人正推着购物车向付款台走去。

name: halfway
interpret: adj.中途的，不彻底的，部分的；adv.半路地，在中途，在半途
example: 单词 halfway 的例句||||We had got only halfway when it began to get dark. 走到半路，天就黑了。||||In study the worst danger is give up halfway. 在学习上，最忌讳的是有始无终。

name: fussy
interpret: adj.为琐事担忧的，过分装饰的，爱挑剔的
example: 单词 fussy 的例句||||He is fussy about the way his food's cooked. 他过分计较食物的烹调。||||The little girl dislikes her fussy parents. 小女孩讨厌她那过分操心的父母。

name: fatten
interpret: vt. 养肥；使肥沃；使充实 vi. 养肥；（靠…）发财
example: 单词 fatten 的例句||||The new feed can fatten the chicken up quickly enough for market. 新饲料能使鸡长得更快，以适应市场需求。||||We keep animals in pens to fatten them. 我们把动物关在围栏里把它们养肥。

name: entree
example: 单词 entree 的例句||||She made a graceful entree into the ballroom. 她进入舞厅时显示非常优雅。||||Her wealth and reputation gave her entree into upper-class circles. 她的财富和声望使她得以进入上层社会。

name: expedition
example: 单词 expedition 的例句||||The scientists will go on an expedition to the South Pole. 这些科学家们将要去南极考察。||||Who will be responsible for the expedition's supplies? 谁将负责探险队的物资供应？

name: bracelet
example: 单词 bracelet 的例句||||The jeweler charges lots of money to set diamonds in a bracelet. 珠宝匠要很多钱才肯把钻石镶在手镯上。||||She left her gold bracelet as a pledge. 她留下她的金手镯作抵押品。

name: salesperson
example: 单词 salesperson 的例句||||A salesperson works in a shop. 售货员在商店工作。||||Vanessa is a salesperson in a woman's wear department. 凡妮莎是女装部的售货员。

name: pro
interpret: n.赞成，赞成的意见，赞成者
example: 单词 pro 的例句||||The two debating teams argued the question pro and con. 辩论的两组从赞成与反对两方面辩这一问题。|||| Are you pro or con nuclear disarmament? 你是赞成还是反对核裁军？

name: exhaustion
interpret: n.耗尽枯竭，疲惫，筋疲力尽，竭尽，详尽无遗的论述
example: 单词 exhaustion 的例句||||She slept the sleep of exhaustion. 她因疲劳而酣睡。||||His exhaustion was obvious when he fell asleep standing. 他站着睡着了，显然是太累了。

name: exhausted
interpret: adj.极其疲惫的，精疲力尽的
example: 单词 exhausted 的例句||||It was a long haul home and we arrived exhausted. 搬运回家的这段路程特别长，到家时我们已筋疲力尽。|||| Jenny was exhausted by the hustle of city life. 珍妮被城市生活的忙乱弄得筋疲力尽。

name: pushy
interpret: adj.固执己见的，一意孤行的
example: 单词 pushy 的例句||||But she insisted and was very pushy. 但她一直坚持,而且很急于求成。||||He made himself unpopular by being so pushy. 他特别喜欢出风头，所以人缘不好。

name: crouch
interpret: vi. 蹲伏，蜷伏；卑躬屈膝 vt. 低头；屈膝 n. 蹲伏
example: 单词 crouch 的例句||||I crouched on the ground. 我蹲在地上。||||He crouched down beside him. 他在他的旁边蹲下来。

name: smoothly
interpret: adv.平滑地，顺利地，流利地，流畅地
example: 单词 smoothly 的例句||||The workmen are very cooperative, so the work goes on smoothly. 工人们十分合作，所以工作进展顺利。|||| Just change one or two words and the sentence will read smoothly. 这句话只要动一两个字就顺了。

name: outdated
interpret: adj.旧式的，落伍的，过时的；v.使过时
example: 单词 outdated 的例句||||That list of addresses is outdated, many have changed. 那个通讯录已经没用了，许多地址已经改了。|||| Many of us conform to the outdated customs laid down by our forebears. 我们许多人都遵循祖先立下的过时习俗。

name: animation
interpret: n.活泼，兴奋，卡通片／动画片的制作
example: 单词 animation 的例句||||They are full of animation as they talked about their childhood. 当他们谈及童年的往事时都非常兴奋。||||The animation of China made a great progress. 中国的卡通片制作取得很大发展。

name: pimple
example: 单词 pimple 的例句||||His face was covered with pimples. 他满脸粉刺。|||| This is also a way to prevent the pimple. 这也是防止疙瘩的一个途径。

name: optometrist
example: 单词 optometrist 的例句||||Where can I find a good optometrist? 我在哪里能找一个好的验光师呢？||||If you need glasses, you should see an optometrist. 若是你要配眼镜，你要找去验光师。

name: needy
interpret: adj.贫穷的，贫困的，生活艰苦的
example: 单词 needy 的例句||||Although he was poor, he was quite generous to his needy friends. 他虽穷，但对贫苦的朋友很慷慨。||||They awarded scholarships to needy students. 他们给贫苦学生颁发奖学金。

name: hostel
example: 单词 hostel 的例句||||I lived in a hostel while I was a student. 我求学期间住在青年招待所里。||||He says he's staying at a Youth Hostel. 他说他现住在一家青年招待所。

name: seasonal
example: 单词 seasonal 的例句||||The town relies on the seasonal tourist industry for jobs. 这个城镇依靠季节性旅游业提供就业机会。|||| The hors d'oeuvre is seasonal vegetables. 餐前小吃是应时蔬菜。

name: presenter
interpret: n.（电视、广播的）主持人，赠与者
example: 单词 presenter 的例句||||Most people think being a television presenter is exciting. 很多人认为当电视节目主持人是一件刺激的事情。||||The programme dispensed with its most popular presenter. 这个节目最受欢迎的主持人被换掉了。

name: warden
interpret: n.监察员，监狱长，看守人，监护人
example: 单词 warden 的例句||||He is the warden of an old people's home. 他是一家养老院的管理员。||||The warden of the prison signed the release. 监狱长签发释放令。

name: gateway
interpret: n.大门口，出入口，途径，方法
example: 单词 gateway 的例句||||Hard work is the gateway to success. 努力工作是通往成功之路。||||A man collected tolls at the gateway. 一个人在大门口收通行费。

name: efficiently
example: 单词 efficiently 的例句||||The worker oils the machine to operate it more efficiently. 工人给机器上油以使机器运转更有效。|||| Local authorities have to learn to allocate resources efficiently. 地方政府必须学会有效地分配资源。

name: dryer
example: 单词 dryer 的例句||||He bought a dryer yesterday. 他昨天买了一台干燥机。||||There is a washer and a dryer in the basement. 地下室里有洗衣机和烘干机。

name: evergreen
example: 单词 evergreen 的例句||||Some trees are evergreen. They are called evergreen. 有的树是常青的，被叫做常青树。||||There is a small evergreen shrub on the hillside. 山腰上有一小块常绿灌木丛。

name: flask
example: 单词 flask 的例句||||There is some deposit in the bottom of the flask. 这只烧杯的底部有些沉淀物。||||He took out a metal flask from a canvas bag. 他从帆布包里拿出一个金属瓶子。

name: cracker
example: 单词 cracker 的例句||||Buy me some peanuts and cracker. 给我买一些花生和饼干。||||There was a cracker beside every place at the table. 桌上每个位置旁都有彩包爆竹。

name: Neptune
example: 单词 Neptune 的例句||||Neptune is the furthest planet from the sun. 海王星是离太阳最远的行星。||||Neptune turned out to be a dynamic, stormy world. 海王星原来是个有生气、多风暴的世界。

name: mince
interpret: n.切碎物；v.切碎，矫揉做作地说
example: 单词 mince 的例句||||Would you like me to mince the meat for you? 你要我替你把肉切碎吗？||||Don't mince matters, but speak plainly. 不要含糊其词，有话就直说吧。

name: raisin
example: 单词 raisin 的例句||||They baked us raisin bread. 他们给我们烤葡萄干面包。||||You can also make raisin scones. 你也可以做葡萄干烤饼。

name: Saturn
example: 单词 Saturn 的例句||||Astronomers used to ask why only Saturn has rings. 天文学家们过去一直感到奇怪，为什么只有土星有光环。|||| These comparisons suggested that Saturn is made of lighter materials. 这些比较告诉我们，土星由较轻的物质构成。

name: sift
interpret: vt. 筛选；撒；过滤；详查 vi. 筛；详查；撒下；细究
example: 单词 sift 的例句||||Sift out the wheat from the chaff. 把小麦的壳筛出来。||||Sift sugar on top of the cake. 在蛋糕上面撒上糖。

name: Uranus
example: 单词 Uranus 的例句||||Uranus is unusual because it is tilted. 天王星非常特殊，因为它是倾斜的。||||Uranus represents sudden change and rebellion. 天王星代表突然性的改变和反叛。

name: abacus
example: 单词 abacus 的例句||||They also learned to use the abacus. 他们还学习珠算。||||The abacus is the ancestor of the modern computer. 算盘是现代电脑的原型。

name: alphabetical
interpret: adj.字母（表）的，依字母顺序的
example: 单词 alphabetical 的例句||||Please arrange these books in alphabetical order. 请把这些书按字母顺序整理一下。||||There is no need to maintain a strict alphabetical sequence. 不必保持严格的字顺。

name: countable
example: 单词 countable 的例句||||The word "person" is a countable noun. person这个词是个可数名词。||||Countable nouns have singular and plural forms. 可数名词有单数和复数之分。

name: phenomenon
interpret: n.现象，特殊的人，特殊的事物，奇迹
example: 单词 phenomenon 的例句||||Beethoven was a phenomenon among many musicians. 贝多芬是众多的音乐家中的天才。||||How do you explain this phenomenon? 这种现象怎样解释？

name: depressed
interpret: adj.沮丧的，抑郁的，不景气的，萧条的
example: 单词 depressed 的例句||||When he was depressed, he felt utterly divorced from reality. 他心情沮丧时就感到完全脱离了现实。|||| His mother was depressed by the sad news. 这个坏消息使他的母亲意志消沉。

name: drizzle
interpret: vi. 下毛毛雨 vt. 下毛毛雨 n. 细雨，毛毛雨
example: 单词 drizzle 的例句||||The shower tailed off into a drizzle. 阵雨越来越小，最后变成了毛毛雨。||||Yesterday the radio forecast drizzle, and today it is indeed raining. 昨天预报有小雨，今天果然下起来了。

name: malaria
example: 单词 malaria 的例句||||He had frequent attacks of malaria. 他常患疟疾。||||Malaria is a kind of serious malady. 疟疾是一种严重的疾病。

name: truthful
interpret: adj.真实的，说实话的，诚实的
example: 单词 truthful 的例句||||You can count on him for a truthful report of the accident. 你放心，他会对事故作出如实的报告的。||||I don't think you are being entirely truthful. 我认为你并没全讲真话。

name: pyjamas
example: 单词 pyjamas 的例句||||This pyjamas has many repairs. 这件睡衣有许多修补过的地方。||||Martin was in his pyjamas. 马丁穿着睡衣。

name: mule
example: 单词 mule 的例句||||A mule is a cross between a mare and a donkey. 骡子是母马和公驴的杂交后代。||||He is an old mule. 他是个老顽固。

name: pony
example: 单词 pony 的例句||||His father gave him a pony as a Christmas present. 他父亲给了他一匹小马驹作为圣诞礼物。||||They made him pony up the money he owed. 他们逼他还债。

name: northward
example: 单词 northward 的例句||||He pointed his boat northward. 他将船驶向北方。||||I would have a chance to head northward quickly. 我就很快有机会去北方了。

name: gutter
interpret: n.沟，街沟，水槽，檐槽，贫民窟
example: 单词 gutter 的例句||||There's a cigarette packet thrown into the gutter. 阴沟里有个香烟盒。||||He picked her out of the gutter and made her a great lady. 他使她脱离贫苦生活，并成为贵妇。

name: kindly
interpret: adj.和蔼的，温和的，爽快的；adv.温和地，亲切地
example: 单词 kindly 的例句||||Her neighbours spoke of her as kindly and hospitable. 她的邻居都说她和蔼可亲、热情好客。||||A shadow passed over the kindly face of the old woman. 一道阴影掠过老太太慈祥的面孔。

name: thermos
example: 单词 thermos 的例句||||Can I borrow your thermos? 我可以借用你的暖水瓶吗？||||It's handy to have the thermos here. 暖瓶放在这儿好拿。

name: seafood
example: 单词 seafood 的例句||||There's an excellent seafood restaurant near here. 离这儿不远有家非常不错的海鲜馆。||||Shrimps are a popular type of seafood. 小虾是比较普遍的一种海味。

name: disappearance
example: 单词 disappearance 的例句||||He was hard put to it to explain her disappearance. 他难以说明她为什么不见了。||||Her disappearance gave rise to the wildest rumours. 她失踪一事引起了各种流言蜚语。

name: generosity
example: 单词 generosity 的例句||||We should match their generosity with our own. 我们应该像他们一样慷慨大方。||||We adore them for their generosity. 我们钦佩他们的慷慨。

name: modem
example: 单词 modem 的例句||||Does your computer have a modem? 你的电脑有调制解调器吗？||||Provides a connection to your computer via a modem. 通过调制解调器连接到计算机上。

name: locust
example: 单词 locust 的例句||||A locust is a kind of destructive insect. 蝗虫是一种害虫。||||This illustration shows a vertical section through the locust. 本图所示为蝗虫的纵剖面。

name: eastwards
interpret: adj.向东方（的），朝东（的）；n.向东的方向
example: 单词 eastwards 的例句||||The current sets strongly eastwards. 急流迅猛东去。||||The Changjiang River rolls on eastwards. 长江滚滚向东流。

name: sprint
interpret: n.短距离赛跑；vi. 奋力而跑，冲刺；vt.全速跑过
example: 单词 sprint 的例句||||He put on a sprint to catch the bus. 他全速奔跑以赶上公共汽车。||||The runner seemed to be rallied for a final sprint. 这名赛跑者似乎在振作精神作最后的冲刺。

name: athletics
example: 单词 athletics 的例句||||When I was at school I was always hopeless at athletics. 我上学的时候体育十分糟糕。||||Our team tied with theirs in athletics. 在田径比赛中，我们队与他们队旗鼓相当。

name: lyric
example: 单词 lyric 的例句||||This is a good example of Shelley's lyric poetry. 这首诗是雪莱抒情诗的范例。||||His earlier work announced a lyric talent of the first order. 他的早期作品显露了一流的抒情才华。

name: trek
interpret: vi.作长途艰辛的旅行；n.长途艰苦的旅行
example: 单词 trek 的例句||||We often go pony-trek in the summer. 夏季我们经常骑马旅行。||||It took us the whole day to trek across the rocky terrain. 我们花了一整天的时间艰难地穿过那片遍布岩石的地带。

name: spotlight
interpret: n.公众注意的中心，聚光灯，探照灯，视听，注意，醒目
example: 单词 spotlight 的例句||||This week the spotlight is on the world of fashion. 本周引人瞩目的是时装界。||||The spotlight followed her round the stage. 聚光灯的光圈随着她在舞台上转。

name: hoax
interpret: vt.欺骗，哄骗，愚弄；n.愚弄人，恶作剧
example: 单词 hoax 的例句||||They were the victims of a cruel hoax. 他们是一个残忍恶作剧的受害者。||||They hoax him out of his money. 他们骗去他的钱。

name: adjustable
example: 单词 adjustable 的例句||||More expensive cameras have adjustable focusing. 比较贵的照相机有可调焦距。||||The chair has the virtue of being adjustable. 这种椅子具有可调节的优点。

name: Buddhist
example: 单词 Buddhist 的例句||||The old lady fell down in adoration before Buddhist images. 那老太太在佛像面前顶礼膜拜。||||In the eye of the Buddhist, every worldly affair is vain. 在佛教徒的眼里，人世上一切事情都是空的。

name: aquatic
example: 单词 aquatic 的例句||||Aquatic sports include swimming and rowing. 水上运动包括游泳和划船。||||We visited an aquatic city in Italy. 我们在意大利访问过一个水上城市。

name: spotted
interpret: adj.有斑点的，斑纹的，弄污了的
example: 单词 spotted 的例句||||The milkman selected the spotted cows, from among a herd of two hundred. 牛奶商从一群200头牛中选出有斑点的牛。||||Sam's shop stocks short spotted socks. 山姆的商店屯积了有斑点的短袜。

name: colon
example: 单词 colon 的例句||||Here, too, the colon must be followed by a dash. 这里也是一样，应当在冒号后加破折号。||||The colon is the locus of a large concentration of bacteria. 结肠是大浓度的细菌所在地。

name: punctuation
example: 单词 punctuation 的例句||||My son's punctuation is terrible. 我儿子的标点符号很糟糕。||||A piece of writing without any punctuation is difficult to understand. 一篇没有任何标点符号的文章是很难懂的。

name: pal
example: 单词 pal 的例句||||He is a pal of mine. 他是我的一个朋友。|||| Listen, pal, I don't want you talking to my sister any more. 听着，小子，我不让你再和我妹妹说话了。

name: curry
interpret: n.咖哩粉，咖哩饭菜；v.用咖哩粉调味，用马栉梳，制革
example: 单词 curry 的例句||||Rice makes an excellent complement to a curry dish. 有咖喱的菜配米饭最棒。||||Add a teaspoonful of curry powder. 加一茶匙咖喱粉。

name: funky
interpret: adj.畏缩的，怯懦的，霉臭的；adj.新式的，时髦的
example: 单词 funky 的例句||||The kitchen smelled really funky. 这个厨房有一股霉味。||||It is a funky restaurant with very interesting art on the walls. 那是一家墙上挂着很有意思的绘画的新潮餐馆。

name: exclamation
example: 单词 exclamation 的例句||||He could not restrain an exclamation of approval. 他禁不住喝一声采。||||The author used three exclamation marks at the end of the last sentence to wake up the readers. 作者在文章的最后一句连用了三个惊叹号，以引起读者的注意。

name: binoculars
example: 单词 binoculars 的例句||||He watched the play through his binoculars. 他用双筒望远镜看戏。||||If I had binoculars, I could see that comet clearly. 如果我有望远镜，我就可以清楚地看见那颗彗星。

name: lookout
example: 单词 lookout 的例句||||You can see everything around from the lookout. 从了望台上你可以看清周围的一切。||||It's a bad lookout for the company if interest rates don't come down. 如果利率降不下来，公司的前景可就不妙了。

name: infinitive
example: 单词 infinitive 的例句||||The use of the split infinitive is now generally acceptable. 分裂不定式的用法现在已被广泛接受。|||| Modal verbs generally take the bare infinitive. 情态动词通常用不带to的不定式。

name: lighter
interpret: n.打火机，点火器；驳船；v.用驳船运送；light的比较级
example: 单词 lighter 的例句||||The portrait was touched up so as to make it lighter. 这张画经过润色，色调明朗了一些。||||The lighter works off the car battery. 引燃器利用汽车蓄电池打火。

name: titanic
example: 单词 titanic 的例句||||We have been making titanic effort to achieve our purpose. 我们一直在作极大的努力，以达到我们的目的。|||| The island was created by titanic powers and they are still at work today. 台湾岛是由一个至今仍然在运作的巨大力量塑造出来的。

name: hood
interpret: n.头巾，兜帽，覆盖；v.罩上，以头巾覆盖
example: 单词 hood 的例句||||She is wearing a red cloak with a hood. 她穿着一件红色带兜帽的披风。||||The car hood was dented in. 汽车的发动机罩已凹了进去。

name: taxpayer
example: 单词 taxpayer 的例句||||The new scheme will run off with a lot of the taxpayer's money. 这项新计划将用去纳税人许多钱。|||| The taxpayer are unfavourably disposed towards the recent tax increase. 纳税者对最近的增加税收十分反感。

name: vaccine
interpret: n.牛痘苗，疫苗；adj.牛痘的，疫苗的
example: 单词 vaccine 的例句||||The polio vaccine has saved millions of lives. 脊髓灰质炎疫苗挽救了数以百万计的生命。||||She takes a vaccine against influenza every fall. 她每年秋季接种流感疫苗。

name: trainee
example: 单词 trainee 的例句||||The trainee checked out all right on his first flight. 受训者第一次飞行完全合格。||||Few of the trainee footballers make it to the top. 足球受训人员中没有几个能达到顶级水平。

name: walnut
interpret: n.胡桃，胡桃木，胡桃色，茶色
example: 单词 walnut 的例句||||Walnut is a local specialty here. 核桃是此地的土特产。||||The stool comes in several sizes in walnut or mahogany. 凳子有几种尺寸，材质分胡桃木和红木两种。

name: zoology
example: 单词 zoology 的例句||||I would like to brush up my zoology. 我想重新温习一下动物学。||||The library didn't stock zoology textbooks. 这家图书馆没有动物学教科书。

name: wilderness
interpret: n.杳无人烟的一片陆地、水等，荒漠
example: 单词 wilderness 的例句||||She drove the herd of cattle through the wilderness. 她赶着牛群穿过荒野。||||Education in the wilderness is not a matter of monetary means. 荒凉地区的教育不是钱财问题。

name: archaeology
example: 单词 archaeology 的例句||||She teaches archaeology at the university. 她在大学里教考古学。||||He displayed interest in archaeology. 他对考古学有兴趣。

name: unconditional
interpret: adj.无条件的，无限制的，绝对的
example: 单词 unconditional 的例句||||The victorious army demanded unconditional surrender. 胜方要求敌人无条件投降。||||My love for all my children is unconditional. 我对自己所有孩子的爱都是无条件的。

name: brainstorm
interpret: vi.动脑筋，出主意，想办法，献计，献策
example: 单词 brainstorm 的例句||||The women meet twice a month to brainstorm and set business goals for each other. 她们每个月聚会两次，在一起出谋献策，为各自制定生意目标。||||We can brainstorm a list of the most influential individuals in the company. 我们可以集体讨论，列出该公司中最有影响的人员的名单。

name: demonstration
example: 单词 demonstration 的例句||||His new book is a demonstration of his patriotism. 他写的新书是他的爱国精神的证明。||||He gave a demonstration of the new technique then and there. 他当场表演了这种新的操作方法。

name: injustice
interpret: n.非正义，不公正，不公平，侵犯（别人的）权利
example: 单词 injustice 的例句||||They complained of injustice in the way they had been treated. 他们抱怨受到不公平的对待。||||All his life he has been struggling against injustice. 他一生都在与不公正现象作斗争。

name: mariner
interpret: n.水手号不载人航天探测器，海员，航海者
example: 单词 mariner 的例句||||A smooth sea never made a skillful mariner. 平静的大海决不能造就熟练的水手。||||A mariner must have his eye upon rocks and sands as well as upon the North Star. 海员不仅要盯着北极星，还要注意暗礁和险滩。

name: metaphor
example: 单词 metaphor 的例句||||Using metaphor, we say that computers have senses and a memory. 打个比方，我们可以说计算机有感觉和记忆力。||||In poetry the rose is often a metaphor for love. 玫瑰在诗中通常作为爱的象征。

name: skier
example: 单词 skier 的例句||||She is a skier who is unafraid of danger. 她是一名敢于冒险的滑雪者。||||The skier skimmed across the snow. 滑雪者飞快地滑过雪地。

name: segregation
example: 单词 segregation 的例句||||Many school boards found segregation a hot potato in the early 1960s. 在60年代初，许多学校部门都觉得按水平分班是一个棘手的问题。||||They were tired to death of segregation and of being kicked around. 他们十分厌恶种族隔离和总是被人踢来踢去。

name: pollutant
interpret: n.污染物质，散布污染物质者
example: 单词 pollutant 的例句||||Coal itself is a heavy pollutant. 煤本身就是一种严重的污染物。||||Carbon dioxide may not be a typical air pollutant. 二氧化碳可能不是一种典型的污染物。

name: shameful
example: 单词 shameful 的例句||||It is very shameful of him to show off. 他向人炫耀自己，真不害臊。||||We must expose this shameful activity to the newspapers. 我们一定要向报社揭露这一无耻行径。

name: runaway
interpret: n.逃走的人，逃亡，亡命者；adj.逃亡的，逃走的
example: 单词 runaway 的例句||||The police have not found the runaway to date. 警察迄今没抓到逃犯。||||He was praised for bringing up the runaway horse. 他勒住了脱缰之马受到了表扬。

name: unearth
example: 单词 unearth 的例句||||Most of the unearth relics remain intact. 大多数出土文物仍保持完整无损。||||More human remains have been unearthed in the north. 北部又挖掘出了更多的人体遗骸。

name: airway
example: 单词 airway 的例句||||Lay them on their side and ensure the airway is unobstructed. 让他们侧躺着，并确保呼吸道畅通。||||There is a purple airway in London Airport. 伦敦机场里有一条皇家专用飞机跑道。

name: transportation
interpret: n.运输，运输系统，运输工具
example: 单词 transportation 的例句||||The transportation of goods by air costs a lot. 航空运输货物花费很高。||||He finally solved the difficulty of transportation. 他终于解决了运输的困难。

name: survivor
example: 单词 survivor 的例句||||The sole survivor of the crash was an infant. 这次撞车的惟一幸存者是一个婴儿。||||There was only one survivor of the plane crash. 这次飞机失事中只有一名幸存者。

name: swap
example: 单词 swap 的例句||||I will swap you my bicycle for your radio. 我想拿我的自行车换你的收音机。||||This comic was a swap that I got from Nick. 这本漫画书是我从尼克那里换来的。

name: aboriginal
interpret: adj.（指动植物）土生的，原产地的，土著的
example: 单词 aboriginal 的例句||||They managed to wipe out the entire aboriginal population. 他们终于把那些土著人全部消灭了。||||The lndians are the aboriginal Americans. 印第安人是美国的土著人。

name: adviser
example: 单词 adviser 的例句||||They employed me as an adviser. 他们聘请我当顾问。||||Our department has engaged a foreign teacher as phonetic adviser. 我们系已经聘请了一位外籍老师作为语音顾问。

name: zoologist
example: 单词 zoologist 的例句||||Charles Darwin was a famous zoologist. 查尔斯达尔文是一位著名的动物学家。||||The zoologist had spent a long time living with monkeys. 这位动物学家与猴子一起生活了很长时间。

name: awareness
example: 单词 awareness 的例句||||There is a general awareness that smoking is harmful. 人们普遍认识到吸烟有害健康。|||| Environmental awareness has increased over the years. 这些年来人们的环境意识增强了。

name: cascade
interpret: n.小瀑布，喷流；层叠；vi.成瀑布落下
example: 单词 cascade 的例句||||She watched the magnificent waterfall cascade down the mountainside. 她看着壮观的瀑布从山坡上倾泻而下。||||Her hair fell over her shoulders in a cascade of curls. 她的卷发像瀑布一样垂在肩上。

name: bishop
example: 单词 bishop 的例句||||He was a bishop who was held in reverence by all. 他是一位被大家都尊敬的主教。||||Two years after his death the bishop was canonised. 主教逝世两年后被正式封为圣者。

name: idol
example: 单词 idol 的例句||||As an only child he was the idol of his parents. 作为独子，他是父母的宠儿。||||Blind worship of this idol must be ended. 对这个偶像的盲目崇拜应该结束了。

name: hygiene
example: 单词 hygiene 的例句||||Their course of study includes elementary hygiene and medical theory. 他们的课程包括基础卫生学和医疗知识。||||He's going to give us a lecture on public hygiene. 他要给我们作关于公共卫生方面的报告。

name: legendary
interpret: adj.传奇（中）的，闻名遐迩的；n.传奇（文学）
example: 单词 legendary 的例句||||Legendary stories are passed down from parents to children. 传奇故事是由父母传给孩子们的。||||Odysseus was a legendary Greek hero. 奥狄修斯是传说中的希腊英雄。

name: lesser
interpret: adj.次要的，较小的；adv.较小地，较少地
example: 单词 lesser 的例句||||Kept some of the lesser players out. 不让那些次要的球员参加联赛。||||She has also been affected, but to a lesser degree. 她也受到波及，但程度较轻。

name: notably
interpret: adv.值得注意地，显著地，尤其地，特别地
example: 单词 notably 的例句||||Many students were absent, notably the monitor. 许多学生缺席，特别是连班长也没来。|||| A notably short, silver-haired man, he plays basketball with his staff several times a week. 他个子明显较为矮小，一头银发，每周都会和他的员工一起打几次篮球。

name: memorise
example: 单词 memorise 的例句||||An actor must be able to memorise his lines. 演员须善于熟记台词。||||I shall try to memorise all these phrases. 我要熟记所有这些词组。

name: nutritional
example: 单词 nutritional 的例句||||A diet lacking in nutritional value will not keep a person healthy. 缺乏营养价值的饮食不能维持人的健康。||||The labels on food products give a lot of information about their nutritional content. 食品上的标签提供很多关于营养成分的信息。

name: opium
example: 单词 opium 的例句||||That man gave her a dose of opium. 那男人给了她一剂鸦片。||||Opium is classed under the head of narcotic. 鸦片是归入麻醉剂一类的东西。

name: primate
interpret: n.灵长类（目）动物，首席主教；adj.首要的
example: 单词 primate 的例句||||14 percent of primate species are highly endangered. 14%的灵长类物种处于高度濒危状态。||||The woolly spider monkey is the largest primate in the Americas. 绒毛蛛猴是美洲最大的灵长类动物。

name: restriction
example: 单词 restriction 的例句||||The park is open to the public without restriction. 这个公园对公众开放，没有任何限制。||||The 30 mph speed restriction applies in all built-up areas. 每小时限速30英里适用于所有建筑物聚集区。

name: risky
example: 单词 risky 的例句||||It may be risky but we will chance it anyhow. 这可能有危险，但我们无论如何要冒一冒险。||||He is well aware how risky this investment is. 他心里对这项投资的风险十分清楚。

name: craftsman
interpret: n.技工，精于一门工艺的匠人
example: 单词 craftsman 的例句||||A cabinet maker must be a master craftsman. 家具木工必须是技艺高超的手艺人。||||The craftsman is working up the mass of clay into a toy figure. 艺人把一团泥捏成玩具形状。

name: outspoken
interpret: adj.直言无讳的，坦率的，坦白无隐的
example: 单词 outspoken 的例句||||He was outspoken in his criticism. 他在批评中直言不讳。||||She is an outspoken critic of the school system in this city. 她是这座城市里学校制度的坦率的批评者。

name: statistic
interpret: n.统计量；adj.统计的，统计学的
example: 单词 statistic 的例句||||Official statistics show real wages declining by 24%. 官方统计数字表明实际工资下降了24%。||||There are no reliable statistics for the number of deaths in the battle. 关于阵亡人数没有可靠的统计数字。

name: carnival
interpret: n.嘉年华会，狂欢，狂欢节，巡回表演
example: 单词 carnival 的例句||||I got some good shots of the carnival. 我有几个狂欢节的精彩镜头。||||Our street puts on a carnival every year. 我们街的居民每年举行一次嘉年华会。

name: beaver
example: 单词 beaver 的例句||||The hat is made of beaver. 这顶帽子是海狸毛皮制的。||||A beaver is an animals with big front teeth. 海狸是一种长着大门牙的动物。

name: eastward
example: 单词 eastward 的例句||||The river here tends eastward. 这条河从这里向东流。|||| The crowd is heading eastward, believing that they can find gold there. 人群正在向东移去，他们认为在那里可以找到黄金。

name: incense
interpret: vt. 向…焚香；使…发怒 n. 香；奉承 vi. 焚香
example: 单词 incense 的例句||||This proposal will incense conservation campaigners. 这项提议会激怒环保人士。||||In summer, they usually burn some coil incense to keep away the mosquitoes. 夏天他们通常点香驱蚊。

name: multicultural
interpret: adj.融合多种文化的，多种文化的
example: 单词 multicultural 的例句||||Children growing up in a multicultural society. 在多元文化社会中长大的孩子们。||||The school has been attempting to bring a multicultural perspective to its curriculum. 这所学校已经在尝试将一种多元文化视角引入其课程。

name: unpaid
example: 单词 unpaid 的例句||||Doctors work excessive unpaid overtime. 医生过度加班却无报酬。||||He's doing a month's unpaid work experience with an engineering firm. 他正在一家工程公司无偿工作一个月以获得工作经验。

name: westward
interpret: n.西方，西部；adj.西方的，向西的；adv.向西
example: 单词 westward 的例句||||We live on the westward slope of the hill. 我们住在这座山的西山坡。||||Explore westward or wherever. 向西或到什么别的地方去勘探。

name: ballad
interpret: n.歌谣，民谣，流行爱情歌曲
example: 单词 ballad 的例句||||This poem has the distinctive flavour of a ballad. 这首诗有民歌风味。||||This is a romantic ballad that is pure corn. 这是一首极为伤感的浪漫小曲。

name: briefly
example: 单词 briefly 的例句||||I want to touch briefly on another aspect of the problem. 我想简单地谈一下这个问题的另一方面。||||He was kidnapped and briefly detained by a terrorist group. 他被一个恐怖组织绑架并短暂拘禁。

name: extinction
interpret: n.熄灭，消亡，消灭，灭绝，绝种
example: 单词 extinction 的例句||||The plant is now in danger of extinction. 这种植物现在有绝种的危险。||||The island's way of life is doomed to extinction. 这个岛上的生活方式注定要消失。

name: relic
interpret: n.神圣的遗物，遗迹，纪念物
example: 单词 relic 的例句||||This stone axe is a relic of ancient times. 这石斧是古代的遗物。||||He found himself thinking of the man as a relic from the past. 他把这个男人看成是过去时代的人物。

name: atlas
example: 单词 atlas 的例句||||He reached down the atlas from the top shelf. 他从书架顶层取下地图集。||||The atlas contains forty maps, including three of Great Britain. 这本地图集有40幅地图，其中包括3幅英国地图。

name: delta
example: 单词 delta 的例句||||He has been to the delta of the Nile. 他曾去过尼罗河三角洲。||||The Nile divides at its mouth and forms a delta. 尼罗河在河口分岔，形成了一个三角洲。

name: devoted
interpret: adj.忠诚的，忠实的，热心的，献身于...的
example: 单词 devoted 的例句||||He devoted his life to the educational cause of the motherland. 他为祖国的教育事业贡献了一生。||||We devoted a lengthy and full discussion to this topic. 我们对这个题目进行了长时间的充分讨论。

name: glacier
example: 单词 glacier 的例句||||The glacier calved a large iceberg. 冰河崩解而形成一个大冰山。||||The upper surface of glacier is riven by crevasses. 冰川的上表面已裂成冰隙。

name: livelihood
example: 单词 livelihood 的例句||||Appropriate arrangements will be made for their work and livelihood. 他们的工作和生活会得到妥善安排。||||My father gained a bare livelihood of family by his own hands. 父亲靠自己的双手勉强维持家计。

name: invader
example: 单词 invader 的例句||||They suffered a lot under the invader's heel. 在侵略者的铁蹄下，他们受尽了奴役。||||A country must have the will to repel any invader. 一个国家得有决心击退任何入侵者。

name: Soviet
interpret: adj.苏联的，苏维埃的；n.苏维埃
example: 单词 Soviet 的例句||||Zhukov was a marshal of the former Soviet Union. 朱可夫是前苏联的一位元帅。||||Germany began to attack the Soviet Union in 1941. 德国在1941年开始进攻苏联。

name: brotherhood
interpret: n.兄弟般的关系，手中情谊
example: 单词 brotherhood 的例句||||They broke up the brotherhood. 他们断绝了兄弟关系。||||They live and work together in complete equality and brotherhood. 他们完全平等和兄弟般地在一起生活和工作。

name: workforce
example: 单词 workforce 的例句||||A large part of the workforce is employed in agriculture. 劳动人口中一大部分受雇于农业。||||A quarter of the local workforce is unemployed. 本地劳动力中有四分之一失业。

name: seaman
example: 单词 seaman 的例句||||That young man is a experienced seaman. 那个年轻人是一个经验丰富的水手。||||The Greek seaman went to the hospital five times. 这位希腊海员到该医院去过五次。

name: warship
example: 单词 warship 的例句||||He is serving on a warship in the Pacific. 他在太平洋海域的一艘军舰上服役。||||The warship was making towards the pier. 军舰正驶向码头。

name: astonishment
example: 单词 astonishment 的例句||||They heard him give a loud shout of astonishment. 他们听见他惊奇地大叫一声。||||I was filled with astonishment at her strange action. 我对她的奇怪举动不胜惊异。

name: gust
interpret: n.阵风，突然一阵（雨、烟等），（感情的）迸发
example: 单词 gust 的例句||||A gust of wind blew the front door shut. 一阵大风吹来，把前门关上了。||||A gust of happiness swept through her. 一股幸福的暖流流遍她的全身。

name: perfectly
interpret: adv.完美地，无可非议地，彻底地
example: 单词 perfectly 的例句||||The witnesses were each perfectly certain of what they said. 证人们个个对自己所说的话十分肯定。|||| Everything that we're doing is all perfectly above board. 我们做的每件事情都是光明正大的。

name: opposition
example: 单词 opposition 的例句||||The party leader is facing opposition in his own backyard. 该党领袖在自己的党內遇到了反对。||||The police tried to break down the prisoner's opposition. 警察设法制住了那个囚犯的反抗。

name: confidential
interpret: adj.秘（机）密的，表示信任的，担任机密工作的
example: 单词 confidential 的例句||||He refused to allow his secretary to handle confidential letters. 他不让秘书处理机密文件。||||We have a confidential exchange of views. 我们推心置腹地交换意见。

name: socket
example: 单词 socket 的例句||||He put the electric plug into the socket. 他把电插头插入插座。||||The battery charger plugs into any mains socket. 这个电池充电器可以插入任何类型的电源插座。

name: persuasive
interpret: adj.有说服力的，能说得使人相信的
example: 单词 persuasive 的例句||||His arguments in favour of a new school are very persuasive. 他赞成办一座新学校的理由很有说服力。|||| The evidence was not really persuasive enough. 证据并不是太有说服力。

name: misuse
example: 单词 misuse 的例句||||It disturbs me profoundly that you so misuse your talents. 你如此滥用自己的才能，使我深感不安。||||He was sacked for computer misuse. 他因滥用计算机而被解雇了。

name: billboard
example: 单词 billboard 的例句||||He ploughed his energies into his father's billboard business. 他把精力投入到父亲的广告牌业务中。||||Billboard spreads will be simpler and more eye-catching. 广告牌广告会比较简单且更引人注目。

name: functional
interpret: adj.为实用而设计的，具备功能的，起作用的
example: 单词 functional 的例句||||The telephone was out of order, but is functional now. 电话刚才坏了，但现在可以用了。||||The furniture is not fancy, just functional. 这些家具不是摆着好看的，只是为了实用。

name: sensor
interpret: n.传感器，探测设备，感觉器（官）
example: 单词 sensor 的例句||||The temperature sensor is enclosed in a protective well. 温度传感器密封在保护套管中。||||He plugged the sensor into a outlet. 他把传感器插进电源插座。

name: boxer
example: 单词 boxer 的例句||||The boxer gave his opponent a punch on the nose. 这个拳击手朝他对手的鼻子上猛击一拳。||||He moved lightly on his toes like a boxer. 他像拳击手一样踮着脚轻盈移动。

name: interactive
interpret: adj.相互作用的，互相影响的，（电脑）交互的
example: 单词 interactive 的例句||||The psychotherapy is carried out in small interactive groups. 这种心理治疗是在互动的小组之间进行的。||||This will make videogames more interactive than ever. 这将使电子游戏的互动性更胜以往。

name: martial
interpret: adj.战争的，军事的，尚武的，威武的
example: 单词 martial 的例句||||The sound of martial music is always inspiring. 军乐声总是鼓舞人心的。||||The officer was convicted of desertion at a court martial. 这名军官在军事法庭上被判犯了擅离职守罪。

name: qualified
interpret: adj.合格的，有资格的，胜任的，有限制的
example: 单词 qualified 的例句||||He is qualified as a complete man of letters. 他有资格当真正的文学家。||||We must note that we still lack qualified specialists. 我们必须看到我们还缺乏有资质的专家。

name: hybrid
example: 单词 hybrid 的例句||||That is a hybrid perpetual rose. 那是一株杂交的四季开花的蔷薇。||||The hybrid was tall, handsome and intelligent. 那混血儿高大、英俊、又聪明。

name: defender
example: 单词 defender 的例句||||He shouldered off a defender and shot at goal. 他用肩膀挡开防守队员，然后射门。||||The defender argued down the prosecutor at the court. 辩护人在法庭上驳倒了起诉人。

name: avalanche
example: 单词 avalanche 的例句||||They were killed by an avalanche in the Swiss Alps. 他们在瑞士阿尔卑斯山的一次雪崩中罹难。||||Higher still the snow was ready to avalanche. 在更高处积雪随时都会崩塌。

name: dart
interpret: vt. 投掷，投射；使迅速突然移动 vi. 向前冲，飞奔 n. 飞镖，标枪；急驰，飞奔；（虫的）螯；飞快的移动
example: 单词 dart 的例句||||The child made a sudden dart across the road. 那小孩突然冲过马路。||||Markov died after being struck by a poison dart. 马尔科夫身中毒镖而亡。

name: acupuncture
example: 单词 acupuncture 的例句||||Written records show that acupuncture dates back to the Song Dynasty. 文字记载表明，宋朝就已经有了针灸。||||It's known that acupuncture originated in China. 众所周知，针灸起源于中国。

name: standing
interpret: n.持续，地位；adj.永久的，不动的，直立的，不流动的
example: 单词 standing 的例句||||After the earthquake only a few houses were left standing. 地震过后只有几幢房屋还立着。||||They're standing out against any change in the law. 他们坚决反对对法律做任何修改。

name: sweeping
interpret: adj.范围广大的，一扫无遗的
example: 单词 sweeping 的例句||||The citizens voted for sweeping reforms. 公民投票支持全面的改革。||||Can you hear the wind sweeping through the branches? 你能听到风掠过树枝的声音吗？

name: catching
interpret: adj.易传染的，有魅力的，迷人的，接住
example: 单词 catching 的例句||||There are those who think eczema is catching. 有人就是认为湿疹会传染。||||Enthusiasm is very catching. 热情非常富有感染力。

name: celebrated
example: 单词 celebrated 的例句||||He was soon one of the most celebrated young painters in England. 不久他就成了英格兰最负盛名的年轻画家之一。||||The celebrated violinist was mobbed by the audience. 观众团团围住了这位著名的小提琴演奏家。

name: seasick
example: 单词 seasick 的例句||||When I get seasick, I throw up my food. 我一晕船就呕吐。||||He got seasick during the voyage. 在航行中他晕船。

name: counselor
example: 单词 counselor 的例句||||The counselor gave us some disinterested advice. 顾问给了我们一些无私的忠告。||||Chinese commercial counselor's office in foreign countries. 中国驻国外商务参赞处。

name: gorge
interpret: n.咽喉，胃，暴食，山峡；v.塞饱，狼吞虎咽地吃
example: 单词 gorge 的例句||||East of the gorge leveled out. 峡谷东面地势变得平坦起来。||||It made my gorge rise to hear the news. 这消息令我作呕。

name: registration
example: 单词 registration 的例句||||Marriage without registration is not recognized by law. 法律不承认未登记的婚姻。||||What's your registration number? 你挂的是几号？

name: tuberculosis
example: 单词 tuberculosis 的例句||||People used to go to special health spring to recover from tuberculosis. 人们常去温泉疗养胜地治疗肺结核。||||Tuberculosis is a curable disease. 肺结核是一种可治愈的病。

name: petal
example: 单词 petal 的例句||||Each white petal had a stripe of red. 每一片白色的花瓣上都有一条红色的条纹。||||A petal fluttered to the ground. 一片花瓣飘落到地上。

name: abolition
example: 单词 abolition 的例句||||They declared for the abolition of slavery. 他们声明赞成废除奴隶制度。||||The abolition of the monarchy was part of their price. 废除君主制是他们的其中一部分条件。

name: annoyance
example: 单词 annoyance 的例句||||Why do you always take your annoyance out on me? 为什么你不高兴时总是对我出气？||||I felt annoyance at being teased. 我恼恨别人取笑我。

name: iceberg
example: 单词 iceberg 的例句||||The ship hit an iceberg and went under. 船撞上一座冰山而沉没了。||||The glacier calved a large iceberg. 冰河崩解而形成一个大冰山。

name: cuisine
example: 单词 cuisine 的例句||||This book is the definitive guide to world cuisine. 这本书是世界美食的权威指南。||||This restaurant is renowned for its cuisine. 这家餐馆以其精美的饭菜而闻名。

name: mainstream
interpret: n.（思想或行为的）主流；adj.主流的
example: 单词 mainstream 的例句||||Their views lie outside the mainstream of current medical opinion. 他们的观点不属于当今医学界观点的主流。||||Polls are still largely reflects the mainstream sentiment. 民调还在很大程度上反映了社会主流情绪。

name: accommodation
interpret: n.设备，膳宿，旅馆房间；容纳，提供，适应；调解，妥协；贷款
example: 单词 accommodation 的例句||||Many old people choose to live in sheltered accommodation. 许多老年人选择到养老院居住。||||Have you found accommodation? 找到住处没有？

name: barometer
interpret: n.气压表，睛雨表，反应指标
example: 单词 barometer 的例句||||The barometer marked a continuing fall in atmospheric pressure. 气压表表明气压在继续下降。|||| The arrow on the barometer was pointing to "stormy". 气压计上的箭头指向“有暴风雨”。

name: contagious
example: 单词 contagious 的例句||||It's a highly contagious infection. 这种病极易传染。||||He's got a contagious laugh. 他的笑富有感染力。

name: incurable
interpret: adj.不能医治的，不能矫正的，无救的；n.不治的病人，无救的人
example: 单词 incurable 的例句||||All three babies were born with an incurable heart condition. 三个婴儿都有不可治瘉的先天性心脏病。||||He has an incurable and widespread nepotism. 他们有不可救药的，到处蔓延的裙带主义。

name: sanitation
interpret: n.公共卫生，环境卫生，卫生设备
example: 单词 sanitation 的例句||||The location is exceptionally poor, viewed from the sanitation point. 从卫生角度来看，这个地段非常糟糕。||||Many illnesses are the result of inadequate sanitation. 许多疾病都来源于不健全的卫生设施。

name: steamship
example: 单词 steamship 的例句||||The return may be made on the same steamship. 可乘同一艘汽船当天回来。||||It was so foggy that the steamship almost ran down a small boat leaving the port. 雾很大，汽艇差点把一只正在离港的小船撞沉。

name: summarise
example: 单词 summarise 的例句||||I will summarise what I have done. 我将概述我所做的事情。||||Of course, no one article can summarise the complexities of China today. 当然，没有哪一篇文章能概括出中国今日的复杂性。

name: civilisation
example: 单词 civilisation 的例句||||Energy and ideas are the twin bases of our civilisation. 能源和思想是我们文明的两大基石。||||This opera is one of the cultural totems of Western civilisation. 这部歌剧是西方文明的文化标志物之一。

name: dike
example: 单词 dike 的例句||||They dug a dike along walls of the school. 他们沿校墙挖沟。||||Fortunately, the flood did not break the dike. 还好，这场大水没有把堤坝冲坏。

name: coastal
example: 单词 coastal 的例句||||The ocean waves are slowly eating away the coastal rocks. 大海的波浪慢慢地侵蚀着岸边的岩石。|||| This country will fortify the coastal areas. 该国将加强沿海地区的防御。

name: creek
example: 单词 creek 的例句||||He sprang through the creek. 他跳过小河。||||People sunbathe in the nude on the rocks above the creek. 人们在露出小溪的岩石上裸体晒日光浴。

name: forefinger
example: 单词 forefinger 的例句||||He pinched the leaf between his thumb and forefinger. 他将叶子捏在拇指和食指之间。||||He held it between the tips of his thumb and forefinger. 他用他大拇指和食指尖拿着它。

name: grassland
example: 单词 grassland 的例句||||There is a reach of grassland in the distance. 远处是连绵一片的草原。||||The snowstorm swept the vast expanse of grassland. 暴风雪袭击了辽阔的草原。

name: nutrient
interpret: adj.营养的，滋养的；n.营养物，营养品
example: 单词 nutrient 的例句||||Magnesium is the nutrient element in plant growth. 镁是植物生长的营养要素。||||The roots transmit moisture and nutrient to the trunk and branches. 根将水分和养料输送到干和枝。

name: modernise
example: 单词 modernise 的例句||||If it works, it would help to modernise the entire economy. 这项（改革）一旦实施起效，将有助于整体经济的现代化进程。||||They attempted in vain to modernise these antiquated industries. 他们企图使这些陈旧的工业现代化，结果劳而无功。

name: thaw
interpret: vi. 融解；变暖和 vt. 使融解；使变得不拘束 n. 解冻；融雪
example: 单词 thaw 的例句||||The snow is beginning to thaw. 雪已开始融化。||||The spring thaw caused heavy flooding. 春天解冻引起了洪水泛滥。

name: ecosystem
example: 单词 ecosystem 的例句||||This destroyed the ecosystem of the island. 这样破坏了岛上的生态系统。||||We all have an interest in maintaining the integrity of the ecosystem. 维持生态系统的完整是我们共同的利益。

name: deserted
interpret: adj.荒芜的，荒废的，无人的，被遗弃的
example: 单词 deserted 的例句||||The deserted village was filled with a deathly silence. 这个荒废的村庄死一般的寂静。||||The enemy chieftain was opposed and deserted by his followers. 敌人头目众叛亲离。

name: organise
example: 单词 organise 的例句||||He has the ability to organise. 他很有组织才能。|||| It's my job to organise all the ceremonial events. 由我来组织所有的仪式。

name: peg
interpret: n.木栓，木钉；vt.用木钉钉，用短桩固定
example: 单词 peg 的例句||||Hang your overcoat on the peg in the hall. 把你的大衣挂在门厅的挂衣钩上。||||He hit the peg mightily on the top with a mallet. 他用木槌猛敲木栓顶。

name: migration
interpret: n.迁移，移居，（鸟类等的）迁徙
example: 单词 migration 的例句||||Swallows begin their migration south in autumn. 燕子在秋季开始向南方迁移。||||He described the vernal migration of birds in detail. 他详细地描述了鸟的春季移居。

name: offshore
interpret: adj.海面的，吹向海面的；adv.向海面
example: 单词 offshore 的例句||||A big program of oil exploration has begun offshore. 一个大规模的石油勘探计划正在近海展开。||||A gentle current carried them slowly offshore. 和缓的潮流慢慢地把他们带离了海岸。

name: pensioner
example: 单词 pensioner 的例句||||The tax threshold for a single pensioner is ￡445. 单身领退休年金者的纳税起点为445英镑。||||It was the pensioner's vote late in the day that influenced the election of Mr. Sweet. 最后是领取养老金者的选票影响了斯威特先生的当选。

name: outwards
interpret: adj.外面的，公开的，向外的；adv.向外；n.外形
example: 单词 outwards 的例句||||Does this door open inwards or outwards? 这门朝里开还是朝外开？||||In lapping up a fur, they always put the inner side outwards. 卷毛皮时，他们总是让内层朝外。

name: seedling
example: 单词 seedling 的例句||||She cut down the seedling with one chop. 她一刀就把小苗砍倒了。||||The seedling are coming up full and green. 苗长得茁壮碧绿。

name: addicted
example: 单词 addicted 的例句||||He was addicted to heroin at the age of 17. 他17岁的时候对海洛因上了瘾。||||She's become addicted to love stories. 她迷上了爱情小说。

name: adolescence
example: 单词 adolescence 的例句||||Adolescence is the process of going from childhood to maturity. 青春期是从少年到成年的过渡期。||||The film is about the trials and tribulations of adolescence. 这部电影讲述了青春期的麻烦和苦恼。

name: alcoholic
interpret: adj.（含）酒精的，由酒精引起的；n.酗酒者
example: 单词 alcoholic 的例句||||The alcoholic strength of brandy far exceeds that of wine. 白兰地的酒精浓度远远超过葡萄酒。||||Alcoholic drinks act as a poison to a child. 酒精饮料对小孩犹如毒药。

name: allergic
example: 单词 allergic 的例句||||Alice is allergic to the fur of cats. 艾丽斯对猫的皮毛过敏。||||Many people are allergic to airborne pollutants such as pollen. 许多人对空气传播的污染物过敏，比如花粉。

name: obesity
example: 单词 obesity 的例句||||One effect of overeating may be obesity. 吃得过多能导致肥胖。||||Sugar and fat can more easily lead to obesity than some other foods. 糖和脂肪比其他食物更容易导致肥胖。

name: contradictory
interpret: adj.反驳的，反对的，抗辩的；n.正反对，矛盾对立
example: 单词 contradictory 的例句||||The argument is internally contradictory. 论据本身自相矛盾。||||What he said was self-contradictory. 他讲话前后不符。

name: eruption
interpret: n.火山爆发；（战争等）爆发；（疾病等）发作
example: 单词 eruption 的例句||||The temple was destroyed in the violent eruption of 1470 BC. 庙宇在公元前1470年猛烈的火山爆发中摧毁了。||||The eruption of a volcano is spontaneous. 火山的爆发是自发的。

name: hush
interpret: int.嘘，别出声；n.沉默，静寂；v.使安静
example: 单词 hush 的例句||||A hush fell over the onlookers. 旁观者们突然静了下来。||||Do hush up the scandal! 不要把这丑事声张出去！

name: nicotine
example: 单词 nicotine 的例句||||Many smokers who are chemically addicted to nicotine cannot cut down easily. 许多有尼古丁瘾的抽烟人不容易把烟戒掉。||||Many smokers who are chemically addicted to nicotine cannot cut down easily. 许多有尼古丁瘾的抽烟人不容易把烟戒掉。

name: tornado
example: 单词 tornado 的例句||||A tornado whirled into the town last week. 龙卷风上周袭击了这座城市。||||The approaching tornado struck awe in our hearts. 正在逼近的龙卷风使我们惊恐万分。

name: accusation
example: 单词 accusation 的例句||||I was furious at his making such an accusation. 我对他的这种责备非常气愤。||||She knew that no one would believe her accusation. 她知道没人会相信她的指控。

name: idiomatic
interpret: adj.成语的，符合语言习惯的
example: 单词 idiomatic 的例句||||In our reading we should always be alert for idiomatic expressions. 我们在阅读过程中应经常注意惯用法。||||In his lecture, he bore down on the importance of idiomatic usage in a language. 他在演讲中着重强调了语言中习惯用法的重要性。

name: privately
interpret: adv.以私人的身份，悄悄地，私下地
example: 单词 privately 的例句||||Some ministers admit privately that unemployment could continue to rise. 一些部长私下承认失业率可能继续升高。||||The man privately admits that his motive is profits. 那人私下承认他的动机是为了牟利。

name: technically
example: 单词 technically 的例句||||Technically it is the most advanced equipment ever. 从技术上说，这是最先进的设备。||||The tomato is technically a fruit, although it is eaten as a vegetable. 严格地说，西红柿是一种水果，尽管它是当作蔬菜吃的。

name: swollen
interpret: adj.肿大的，水涨的；v.使变大，肿胀
example: 单词 swollen 的例句||||Her legs had got swollen from standing up all day. 因为整天站着，她的双腿已经肿了。||||A mosquito had bitten her and her arm had swollen up. 蚊子叮了她，她的手臂肿起来了。

name: philosophical
interpret: adj.哲学家的，哲学上的，达观的
example: 单词 philosophical 的例句||||The teacher couldn't answer the philosophical problem. 老师不能解答这个哲学问题。||||She is very philosophical about her bad luck. 她对自己的不幸看得很开。

name: sodium
example: 单词 sodium 的例句||||Out over the town the sodium lights were lit. 在外面，全城的钠光灯都亮了。||||Common salt is a compound of sodium and chlorine. 食盐是钠和氯的复合物。

name: postulate
interpret: n.假定，基本条件；vt.要求，假定
example: 单词 postulate 的例句||||Let's postulate that she is a cook. 我们假定她是一位厨师。||||Freud postulated that we all have a death instinct as well as a life instinct. 弗洛伊德曾假定我们所有人都有生存本能和死亡本能。

name: solvent
example: 单词 solvent 的例句||||Gasoline is a solvent liquid which removes grease spots. 汽油是一种能去掉油污的有溶解力的液体。||||A bankrupt company is not solvent. 一个破产的公司是没有偿还债务的能力的。

name: precisely
interpret: adv.恰好，正好，精确地，细致地
example: 单词 precisely 的例句||||It's precisely that sort of slick sales-talk that I mistrust. 我不相信的正是那种油腔滑调的推销宣传。|||| The man adjusted very precisely. 那个人调得很准。

name: stabilize
interpret: vt.（使）稳定，使稳固，使稳定平衡；vi.稳定
example: 单词 stabilize 的例句||||They are eager to stabilize currencies. 他们急于稳定货币。||||His blood pressure tended to stabilize. 他的血压趋向稳定。

name: sulfur
example: 单词 sulfur 的例句||||Sulfur emissions from steel mills become acid rain. 炼钢厂排放出的硫形成了酸雨。||||Burning may produce sulfur oxides. 燃烧可能会产生硫氧化物。

name: accomplished
interpret: adj.有才艺的；有造诣的；达到了的
example: 单词 accomplished 的例句||||Thanks to your help, we accomplished the task ahead of schedule. 亏得你们帮忙,我们才提前完成了任务。|||| Removal of excess heat is accomplished by means of a radiator. 通过散热器完成多余热量的排出。

name: accomplishment
example: 单词 accomplishment 的例句||||The series of paintings is quite an accomplishment. 这一系列的绘画真是了不起的成就。|||| Money will be crucial to the accomplishment of our objectives. 要实现我们的目标，钱是至关重要的。

name: gadget
interpret: n.小巧的机械，精巧的装置，小玩意儿
example: 单词 gadget 的例句||||This gadget isn't much good. 这小机械没什么用处。||||She has invented a nifty little gadget for undoing stubborn nuts and bolts. 她发明了一种灵巧的小工具用来松开紧固的螺母和螺栓。

name: obese
example: 单词 obese 的例句||||The old man is really obese, it can't be healthy. 那位老人确实过于肥胖了，不能算是健康。||||Being obese and lazy is dangerous to health. 又胖又懒危害健康。

name: cane
interpret: n.手杖，细长的茎，藤条；v.以杖击，以藤编制的
example: 单词 cane 的例句||||This sugar cane is quite sweet and juicy. 这甘蔗既甜又多汁。||||English schoolmasters used to cane the boys as a punishment. 英国小学老师过去常用教鞭打男学生作为惩罚。

name: boredom
example: 单词 boredom 的例句||||Unemployment can drive you mad with boredom. 失业会让你无聊得发疯。||||A walkman can relieve the boredom of running. 跑步时带着随身听就不那么乏味了。

name: excavate
example: 单词 excavate 的例句||||They plan to excavate a large hole. 他们计划挖个大洞。||||A new Danish expedition is again excavating the site in annual summer digs. 一支新的丹麦探险队又在那个遗址上进行一年一度的夏季挖掘。

name: flexibility
interpret: n.柔韧性，弹性，（光的）折射性，灵活性
example: 单词 flexibility 的例句||||Her great strength lies in her flexibility. 她的优势在于她灵活变通。||||The flexibility of a man's muscles will lessen as he becomes old. 人老了肌肉的柔韧性将降低。

name: linguistics
example: 单词 linguistics 的例句||||She plans to take a course in applied linguistics. 她打算学习应用语言学课程。||||Linguistics is a scientific study of the property of language. 语言学是指对语言的性质所作的系统研究。

name: ordeal
interpret: n.苦难经历，（尤指对品格、耐力的）严峻考验
example: 单词 ordeal 的例句||||She managed to keep her sanity throughout the ordeal. 在那场磨难中她始终保持神志正常。||||Being lost in the wilderness for a week was an ordeal for me. 在荒野里迷路一星期对我来说真是一场磨难。

name: outweigh
example: 单词 outweigh 的例句||||The merits of your plan outweigh the defects. 你制定的计划其优点胜过缺点。||||One's merits outweigh one's short-comings. 功大于过。

name: oversee
example: 单词 oversee 的例句||||Soldiers oversee the food handouts. 士兵们看管着救济食品。||||Use a surveyor or architect to oversee and inspect the different stages of the work. 请一位房产检视员或建筑师来监督并检查不同阶段的工作。

name: unstable
example: 单词 unstable 的例句||||This bookcase is too unstable to hold so many books. 这书橱很不结实，装不了这么多书。||||The patient's condition was unstable. 那患者的病情不稳定。

name: additive
example: 单词 additive 的例句||||Colour is often an additive in foods. 颜料经常是各种食物中的添加物。||||Strict safety tests are carried out on food additives. 对食品添加剂进行了严格的安全检测。

name: baggy
interpret: adj.膨胀如袋的，宽松下垂的
example: 单词 baggy 的例句||||My T-shirt went all baggy in the wash. 我的T恤越洗越大了。||||Baggy pants are meant to be stylish, not offensive. 松松垮垮的裤子意味着时髦，而不是无礼。

name: illegible
interpret: adj.难以辨认的，字迹模糊的
example: 单词 illegible 的例句||||It is impossible to deliver this letter because the address is illegible. 由于地址字迹不清，致使信件无法投递。||||Can you see what this note says - his writing is almost illegible! 你能看出这个便条上写些什么吗？他的笔迹几乎无法辨认。

name: impersonal
interpret: adj.无个人感情的，与个人无关的，非人称的
example: 单词 impersonal 的例句||||Even his children found him strangely distant and impersonal. 他的孩子们也认为他跟其他人很疏远，没有人情味。||||His manner seemed rather stiff and impersonal. 他的态度似乎很生硬冷淡。

name: imposing
interpret: adj.使人难忘的，壮丽的，堂皇的，雄伟的
example: 单词 imposing 的例句||||The fortress is an imposing building. 这座城堡是一座宏伟的建筑。||||He has lost his imposing appearance. 他已失去堂堂仪表。

name: inaccessible
example: 单词 inaccessible 的例句||||This novel seems to me among the most inaccessible. 这本书对我来说是最难懂的小说之一。|||| The top of Mount Everest is the most inaccessible place in the world. 珠穆朗玛峰是世界上最难到达的地方。

name: wavelength
example: 单词 wavelength 的例句||||The authorities were unable to jam this wavelength. 当局无法干扰这一波长。||||Radio One has broadcast on this wavelength for years. 广播1台已经用这个波长广播多年了。

name: catalyst
interpret: n.催化剂，造成变化的人或事
example: 单词 catalyst 的例句||||A catalyst is a substance which speeds up a chemical reaction. 催化剂是一种能加速化学反应的物质。||||The workers' demand for better conditions was a catalyst for social change. 工人们要求改善工作条件促进了社会变革。

name: distillation
example: 单词 distillation 的例句||||The discovery of distillation is usually accredited to the Arabs of the 11th century. 通常认为，蒸馏法是阿拉伯人在11世纪发明的。||||The oil is distilled from the berries of this small tree. 油是从这种小树的浆果中提炼出来的。

name: cholesterol
example: 单词 cholesterol 的例句||||There is cholesterol in the cell of body. 人体细胞里有胆固醇。||||They are determining the serum-protein and cholesterol levels. 他们正在测定血清蛋白和胆固醇的浓度。

name: ferment
example: 单词 ferment 的例句||||Fruit juices ferment if they are kept a long time. 果汁若是放置很久，就会发酵。||||The sixties were a time of theological ferment. 六十年代是神学上骚动的时代。

name: enzyme
example: 单词 enzyme 的例句||||Above a certain temperature, the enzyme molecule will become unfolded. 超过一定温度，酶分子将会展开。||||An enzyme that dissolves the fibrin of blood clots. 能溶解血凝块中的纤维的酶。

name: configuration
interpret: n.结构，布局，形态，(计算机)配置
example: 单词 configuration 的例句||||Geographers study the configuration of the mountains. 地理学家研究山脉的地形轮廓。||||Prices range from $119 to $199, depending on the particular configuration. 价格因具体配置而异，从119美元至199美元不等。

name: equilibrium
interpret: n.平衡，均衡，相称，均势，平静
example: 单词 equilibrium 的例句||||Change in the world around us disturbs our inner equilibrium. 我们周围世界的变化扰乱了我们内心的平静。||||This is best expressed in the form of an equilibrium constant. 这最好用平衡常数的形式来表示。

name: conserve
interpret: vt.保存，保护，节约，节省，守恒，不灭
example: 单词 conserve 的例句||||He writes on both sides of the sheet to conserve paper. 他在纸张的两面都写字以节省用纸。||||Conserve your energy, you'll need it! 保存你的精力，你会用得着的！

name: fragrance
example: 单词 fragrance 的例句||||The apple blossoms filled the air with their fragrance. 苹果花使空气充满香味。||||The fragrance of lavender filled the room. 房间里充满了薰衣草的香味。

name: limestone
example: 单词 limestone 的例句||||Limestone is often used in building construction. 石灰岩常用于建筑。||||Cement is made from limestone. 水泥是由石灰石制成的。

name: modification
example: 单词 modification 的例句||||The law, in its present form, is unjust. It needs modification. 现行的法律是不公正的，它需要修改。||||The design requires considerable modification. 这个设计需要作大的修改。

name: outermost
example: 单词 outermost 的例句||||He fired and hit the outermost ring of the target. 他开枪射中了靶子的最外一环。||||The outermost electron is shielded from the nucleus. 原子核对最外层电子的作用受到屏蔽。

name: perpendicular
interpret: adj.垂直的，直立的；n.垂直线，垂直的位置
example: 单词 perpendicular 的例句||||The two lines of bones are set perpendicular to one another. 这两排骨头相互垂直。||||The wall is out of the perpendicular. 这墙有些倾斜。

name: ironic
interpret: adj.讽刺的，有讽刺意味的，出乎意料的
example: 单词 ironic 的例句||||That is a summary and ironic end. 那是一个具有概括性和讽刺意味的结局。||||People used to call me Mr Popularity at high school, but they were being ironic. 人们中学时常把我称作“万人迷先生”，但他们是在挖苦我。

name: brew
interpret: vt. 酿造；酝酿 vi. 酿酒；被冲泡；即将发生 n. 啤酒；质地
example: 单词 brew 的例句||||Let's brew up some more tea. 咱们沏些茶吧。||||The policeman dispelled the crowd lest they should brew trouble. 警察驱散人群，因恐他们酿祸。

name: digestion
example: 单词 digestion 的例句||||This kind of tea acts as an aid to digestion. 这种茶可助消化。||||This food is easy of digestion. 这食物容易消化。

name: referee
interpret: n.裁判员．仲裁人，代表人，鉴定人
example: 单词 referee 的例句||||The team was left raging at the referee's decision. 队员们对裁判员的裁决感到非常气愤。||||The referee blew a whistle at the end of the game. 裁判在比赛结束时吹响了哨子。

name: gland
interpret: n.腺体，(机)密封压盖，填料盖
example: 单词 gland 的例句||||This is a snake's poison gland. 这就是蛇的毒腺。|||| Her mother has an underactive adrenal gland. 她的母亲肾上腺机能不全。

name: buck
example: 单词 buck 的例句||||The boy bent curiously to the skeleton of the buck. 这个男孩好奇地弯下身去看鹿的骸骨。||||The female deer attracts the buck with high-pitched sounds. 雌鹿以尖声吸引雄鹿。

name: predecessor
example: 单词 predecessor 的例句||||It will share the fate of its predecessor. 它将遭受与前者同样的命运。||||The new ambassador is more mature than his predecessor. 新大使比他的前任更成熟一些。

name: unprecedented
example: 单词 unprecedented 的例句||||The air crash caused an unprecedented number of deaths. 这次空难的死亡人数是空前的。||||A flood of this sort is really unprecedented. 这样大的洪水真是十年九不遇。

name: desperately
interpret: adv.极度渴望地，绝望地，孤注一掷地
example: 单词 desperately 的例句||||He was desperately seeking a way to see her again. 他正拼命想办法再见她一面。||||He longed desperately to be back at home. 他非常渴望回家。

name: partially
example: 单词 partially 的例句||||The door was partially concealed by the drapes. 门有一部分被门帘遮住了。||||The police managed to restore calm and the curfew was partially lifted. 警方设法恢复了平静，宵禁部分解除。

name: calligraphy
example: 单词 calligraphy 的例句||||At the calligraphy competition, people asked him to write a few characters. 书法比赛会上，人们请他留字。||||His calligraphy is vigorous and forceful. 他的书法苍劲有力。

name: displacement
example: 单词 displacement 的例句||||They said that time is the feeling of spatial displacement. 他们说时间是空间位移的感觉。||||The displacement of all my energy into caring for the baby. 我所有精力都放在了照顾宝宝上。

name: Congressman
example: 单词 Congressman 的例句||||He related several anecdotes about his first years as a congressman. 他讲述自己初任议员那几年的几则轶事。||||The congressman is meditating a reply to his critics. 这位国会议员正在考虑给他的批评者一个答复。

name: relatively
example: 单词 relatively 的例句||||The rabbit is a relatively recent introduction in Australia. 兔子是相对较新引入澳大利亚的物种。||||The operation was relatively painless. 手术相对来说不痛。

name: brag
interpret: n. 吹牛，自夸 vi. 吹牛，自夸 vt. 吹牛，吹嘘
example: 单词 brag 的例句||||He made brag of his skill. 他夸耀自己技术高明。|||| His wealth is his brag. 他夸张他的财富。

name: passionate
interpret: adj.热情的，热烈的，激昂的，易动情的，易怒的，性情暴躁的
example: 单词 passionate 的例句||||He is said to be the most passionate man. 据说他是最有激情的人。||||He is very passionate about the project. 他对那个项目非常热心。

name: heroism
example: 单词 heroism 的例句||||He received a medal for his heroism. 他由于英勇而获得一枚奖章。||||Stories of his heroism resounded through the country. 他的英雄故事传遍全国。

name: hurl
example: 单词 hurl 的例句||||The best cure for unhappiness is to hurl yourself into your work. 医治愁苦的最好办法就是全身心地投入工作。||||To hurl abuse is no way to fight. 谩骂决不是战斗。

name: stunt
interpret: n.惊人表演，绝技，特技；vt.阻碍...发育，妨碍...生长
example: 单词 stunt 的例句||||Lack of the right food may stunt growth. 缺乏适当的食物会阻碍发育。||||Right up there is where the big stunt is taking place. 那边将会有惊人的表演。

name: horrify
example: 单词 horrify 的例句||||His family were horrified by the change. 他的家人对这一变化感到震惊。||||When I saw these figures I was horrified. 我看到这些数字时无比惊骇。

name: unpack
example: 单词 unpack 的例句||||I must unpack before dinner. 我得在饭前把行李打开。||||She said she would unpack the items later. 她说以后再把箱子里的东西拿出来。

name: accounting
interpret: n.会计，会计学，借贷对照表
example: 单词 accounting 的例句||||A job fell vacant in the accounting department. 财会部出现了一个空缺。||||There's an accounting error in this entry. 这笔账目里有差错。

name: advisor
example: 单词 advisor 的例句||||They employed me as an advisor. 他们聘请我当顾问。||||The professor is engaged as a technical advisor. 这位教授被聘请为技术顾问。

name: canyon
example: 单词 canyon 的例句||||The Grand Canyon in the USA is 1900 metres deep. 美国的大峡谷1900米深。||||The canyon is famous for producing echoes. 这个峡谷以回声而闻名。

name: gathering
example: 单词 gathering 的例句||||He called on Mr. White to speak at the gathering. 他请怀特先生在集会上讲话。||||He is on the wing gathering material for his novels. 他正忙于为他的小说收集资料。

name: environmentalist
example: 单词 environmentalist 的例句||||I had no idea you were such environmentalist before! 我以前还真不知道你是个环保主义者！||||On the internet, anyone can be an environmentalist. 在互联网上，任何人都能成为环保人士。

name: marketing
interpret: n.行销，在市场的买卖，买东西
example: 单词 marketing 的例句||||They are developing marketing network. 他们正在发展销售网络。||||He often goes marketing. 他经常去市场做生意。

name: nervously
example: 单词 nervously 的例句||||He bit his lip nervously, trying not to cry. 他紧张地咬着唇，努力忍着不哭出来。||||He paced nervously up and down on the platform. 他在站台上情绪不安地走来走去。

name: noted
example: 单词 noted 的例句||||The local hotel is noted for its good table. 当地的那家酒店以餐食精美而著称。||||Jim is noted for arriving late for work. 吉姆上班迟到出了名。

name: participation
example: 单词 participation 的例句||||Some of the magic tricks called for audience participation. 有些魔术要求有观众的参与。||||The scheme aims to encourage increased participation in sporting activities. 这个方案旨在鼓励大众更多地参与体育活动。

name: racing
interpret: n.竞赛，赛马；adj.竞赛用的，赛马用的
example: 单词 racing 的例句||||I was watching the racing on television last night. 昨晚我在电视上看赛马。||||The two racing drivers fenced for a chance to gain the lead. 两个赛车手伺机竞相领先。

name: ranch
example: 单词 ranch 的例句||||He went to work on a ranch. 他去一个大农场干活。|||| The ranch is in the middle of a large plateau. 该牧场位于一个辽阔高原的中部。

name: savings
example: 单词 savings 的例句||||I can't afford the vacation, for it would eat up my savings. 我度不起假，那样会把我的积蓄用光的。||||By this time he had used up all his savings. 到这时，他的存款已全部用完。

name: DNA
example: 单词 DNA 的例句||||DNA is stored in the nucleus of a cell. 脱氧核糖核酸储存于细胞的细胞核里。||||Gene mutations are alterations in the DNA code. 基因突变是指DNA密码的改变。

name: conceited
example: 单词 conceited 的例句||||He could not bear that they should be so conceited. 他们这样自高自大他受不了。||||I'm not as conceited as so many people seem to think. 我不像很多人认为的那么自负。

name: hibernate
example: 单词 hibernate 的例句||||Bears often hibernate in caves. 熊常在山洞里冬眠。||||Some warm-blooded animals do not need to hibernate. 一些温血动物不需要冬眠。

name: sperm
example: 单词 sperm 的例句||||Only one sperm fertilises an egg. 只有一个精子使卵子受精。||||In human reproduction, one female egg is usually fertilized by one sperm. 在人体生殖过程中，一个精子使一个卵子受精。

name: imperialism
interpret: n.帝国主义，帝国主义政策
example: 单词 imperialism 的例句||||They held the imperialism in contempt. 他们鄙视帝国主义。||||Imperialism has not been able to subjugate China. 帝国主义不能征服中国。

name: consequence
interpret: n.结果，后果；推理，推断；重要性
example: 单词 consequence 的例句||||The consequence was that he caught a bad cold. 结果是他得了重感冒。||||In consequence he lost his place. 结果，他失去了他的位置。

name: upwards
example: 单词 upwards 的例句||||The trend of prices is still upwards. 物价的趋向是仍在上涨。||||The smoke rose straight upwards. 烟一直向上升。

name: forerunner
example: 单词 forerunner 的例句||||She is a forerunner of the modern women's movement. 她是现代妇女运动的先驱。||||Penicillin was the forerunner of modern antibiotics. 青霉素是现代抗生素的先导。

name: subscription
interpret: n.预订，预订费，亲笔签名，调配法，下标（处方）
example: 单词 subscription 的例句||||We paid a subscription of 5 pounds yearly. 我们按年度缴纳5英镑的订阅费。||||Subscription selling bloomed splendidly. 订阅销售量激增。

name: gale
interpret: n.大风，强风，一阵闹声（尤指笑声等）
example: 单词 gale 的例句||||We got our roof blown off in the gale last night. 昨夜的大风把我们的房顶给掀掉了。||||According to the weather forecast, there will be a gale tomorrow. 据气象台预报，明天有大风。

name: jewelry
example: 单词 jewelry 的例句||||The burglars walked off with all my jewelry. 夜盗偷走了我的全部珠宝。||||Jewelry and lace are mostly feminine belongings. 珠宝和花边多数是女性用品。

name: aggression
example: 单词 aggression 的例句||||So long as we are firmly united, we need fear no aggression. 只要我们紧密地团结，就不必惧怕外来侵略。||||Her view is that aggression is part of human nature. 她认为攻击性是人类本性的一部份。

name: passerby
example: 单词 passerby 的例句||||We had our photo taken by a passerby. 我们请了一个路人为我们照相。||||A passerby heard her screams and rushed to her aid. 一个过路人听见她的尖叫，便冲过去帮助她。

name: organisation
example: 单词 organisation 的例句||||The method of his organisation work is worth commending. 他的组织工作的方法值得称道。||||His application for membership of the organisation was rejected. 他想要加入该组织的申请遭到了拒绝。

name: skilful
example: 单词 skilful 的例句||||The more you practise, the more skilful you'll become. 练习的次数越多，熟练的程度越高。||||He's not very skilful with his chopsticks. 他用筷子不大熟练。

name: symbolic
interpret: adj.象征性的，符号的，象征主义的
example: 单词 symbolic 的例句||||It is symbolic of the fighting spirit of modern womanhood. 它象征着现代妇女的战斗精神。||||The Christian ceremony of baptism is a symbolic act. 基督教的洗礼仪式是一种象征性的做法。

name: Founder
example: 单词 Founder 的例句||||He was extolled as the founder of their Florentine school. 他被称颂为佛罗伦萨画派的鼻祖。|||| According to the old tradition, Romulus was the founder of Rome. 按照古老的传说，罗穆卢斯是古罗马的建国者。

name: nutritious
interpret: adj.有营养的，营养价值高的
example: 单词 nutritious 的例句||||Fresh vegetables are very nutritious. 新鲜蔬菜富于营养。||||Hummingbirds have discovered that nectar and pollen are very nutritious. 蜂鸟发现花蜜和花粉是很有营养的。

name: i.e.
example: 单词 i.e. 的例句||||It weighs ten 1 bs., i.e.about 4.5kg. 它重十磅，即大约四点五公斤。||||I.e.what you forget, you can buy. 也就是说，你忘记带的都可以买得到。

name: adaptable
interpret: adj.能适应的，适应性强的，可改编的
example: 单词 adaptable 的例句||||He is an adaptable man and will soon learn the new work. 他是个适应性很强的人，很快就将学会这种工作。||||The soil is adaptable to the growth of peanuts. 这土壤适宜于花生的生长。

name: optimist
example: 单词 optimist 的例句||||We are optimist and realist. 我们是乐观主义者，又是现实主义者。||||Peter, ever the optimist, said things were bound to improve. 一向乐观的皮特说，事情必定是会好转的。

name: quaint
interpret: adj.古雅的，离奇有趣的，奇怪的
example: 单词 quaint 的例句||||There were many small lanes in the quaint village. 在这古香古色的村庄里，有很多小巷。||||They still keep some quaint old customs. 他们仍然保留着一些稀奇古怪的旧风俗。

name: debit
interpret: n.借方，借项，记人借方的款项
example: 单词 debit 的例句||||To whom shall I debit this sum? 此款应记入谁的账户的借方？||||We undercharge Mr. Smith and have to send him a debit note for the extra amount. 我们少收了史密斯先生的钱，只得给他寄去一张借条所要欠款。

name: congestion
example: 单词 congestion 的例句||||The congestion in the city gets even worse during the summer. 夏天城市交通阻塞尤为严重。||||Parking near the school causes severe traffic congestion. 在学校附近泊车会引起严重的交通堵塞。

name: chronological
interpret: adj.按年月顺序排列的，年代学的
example: 单词 chronological 的例句||||The paintings are exhibited in chronological sequence. 这些画是按创作的时间顺序展出的。||||Give me the dates in chronological order. 把日期按年月顺序给我。

name: conditional
example: 单词 conditional 的例句||||My agreement is conditional on your help. 你肯帮助我才同意。||||There are two forms of most-favored-nation treatment: conditional and unconditional. 最惠国待遇有两种形式:有条件的和无条件的。

name: epic
interpret: n.史诗，叙事诗；adj.史诗般的，壮丽的
example: 单词 epic 的例句||||I gave up my epic and wrote this little tale instead. 我放弃了写叙事诗，而写了这个小故事。||||They held a banquet of epic proportions. 他们举行了盛大的宴会。

name: microscopic
interpret: adj.微小的，细微的，极小的，显微的
example: 单词 microscopic 的例句||||It's impossible to read his microscopic handwriting. 不可能看清他那极小的书写字迹。||||A plant's lungs are the microscopic pores in its leaves. 植物的肺就是其叶片上微细的气孔。

name: miraculous
interpret: adj.像奇迹一样的，不可思议的
example: 单词 miraculous 的例句||||The wounded man made a miraculous recovery. 伤员奇迹般地痊愈了。||||They won a miraculous victory over much stronger enemy. 他们战胜了远比自己强大的敌人，赢得了非凡的胜利。

name: favourable
interpret: adj.赞成的，称赞的，有利的，良好的，顺利的
example: 单词 favourable 的例句||||The company will lend you money on very favourable terms. 这家公司将以非常优惠的条件借钱给你。||||We found that most people are favourable to the idea. 我们发现大多数人同意这个意见。

name: awfully
